Reforming our society will greatly strengthen our state, but has created tensions among the city states under our control. As a result all but the most loyal areas have cut their ties to the central government.
translation: 改革我们的社会将大大增强我们的国家，但也使得我们控制的城邦与中央之间关系变得紧张。结果除了最忠诚的地区之外其他地区已经切断他们与中央政府的联系。

original: They will regret this.
Nourish the gods

Our country has reached an era of turmoil, and the gods demand blood. Rush to your cities and perform blood-letting to nourish and propitiate Tohil, god of war, sacrifice and sustenance. If you do not feed them, you will not be able to bring your disintegrating kingdom back from the brink of destruction.
translation: 我们的国家已经处于动荡之中，神灵需要血。冲进你的城市奉上血祭并平息战神图伊尔的愤怒。如果你不献祭他们，你将无法将你的王国从毁灭的边缘拯救回来。

original: I will lead our nobles in this and may my blood please Tohil.
translation: 我将领导我的贵族们依此行事，希望的鲜血可以抚慰图伊尔.

original: The gods will get no blood from me!
translation: 我们向神灵奉献任何鲜血

original: Blood Sacrifice

Human energy is sent skyward and we receive divine power in return when we make a blood sacrifice. The king uses an obsidian knife or a stingray spine to cut his penis, allowing the blood to fall onto paper held in bowls. The queen pulls a rope with thorns attached through her tongue. The paper stained with blood is burned and the rising smoke communicates with the Sky World.
translation: 血祭将人的能量送上天空并获得神的神的回应。国王用黑曜石刀或一条黄貂鱼脊骨切向自己的阴茎，让血落在碗里。皇后用满是棘刺的绳子刺向舌尖。沾满血迹的纸的燃烧起来，通过升起的烟与天空沟通。

original: I do this gladly.
I will never do this.
Human Sacrifice

Slaves and prisoners are a common sacrifice to the Mayan gods, but even animals such as turkeys, dogs, squirrels, quail, and iguana have been considered suitable offerings. The gods are always craving more blood, and our neighbors claim that orphans and illegitimate children appease the gods faster than any other sacrifice.
translation: 奴隶和囚犯是一种常见的祭祀玛雅神的祭品，但有些动物如鸡，狗，松鼠，鹌鹑，和鬣蜥也被认为是适合的祭品。神总是渴望更多的血，我们的邻居宣称孤儿和非婚生子女比其他人更优先用来进行血祭。

original: Try sacrificing animals.
Sacrifice children - as long as they are parentless.
Cycle of Creation and Destruction

Our stories and myths tell of repeating cycles of creation and destruction which are reminders of the consequences that will happen if humans ever neglect their obligations to the gods. We have a responsibility to the gods who make our continued existence possible. The gods and other forces of creation and chaos fight each 52-year period which may bring the destruction of the worlds. If we ignore our duty to the gods, the battle between them that determines the fate of all earthly creatures might not end in our favor.
translation: 我们的故事和神话讲述了创造和破坏的周期，提醒人类如果忽视他们的义务对神的义务将会发生什么样的后果。我们对维持我们的存在的神负有义务。神和创造和混乱的其他力量每52年进行一场可能带给世界的毁灭的战争。如果我们忽视我们的义务，众神之间的战争，决定所有地球上的生物的命运战争结果不会对我们有利。

original: ...and we the people can only cover in fear...
translation: ...我们的人只能生活在恐惧中...

original: Purification

'A ritual shall always start with a purification,' the priest says to your heir. 'You become pure by fasting, bathing, and confessing, but you must also make sure to respect the gods. When entering the forest inhabited by a god, remember to drink water from a rock depression as soon as possible after you have entered the forest. The water must be spat on the ground and then you are free to continue into the sacred forest.'
translation: “一个仪式总是从净化开始，”牧师对他的继承人说。”在斋戒，沐浴，和坦白之后，你将变得纯洁。但你也必须确保尊重神。当进入森林里居住着神，记住在你进入神居住的森林时，喝从岩石凹陷处流下的水。水必须溅在地上，然后你就可以继续进入神圣的森林。”

original: Remember that, and you will become a great administrator.
translation: 记住那些，你将成为一个伟大的行政官员。

original: Remember that, and you will become a great diplomat.
translation: 记住那些，你将成为一个伟大的外交官。

original: Remember that, and you will become a great military leader.
translation: 记住那些，你将成为一个伟大的军事领袖。

original: Pilgrimages

The Q'eqchi' thirteen sacred mountains, the large cenote in Chichen Itza and local shrines to various gods and goddesses attracts a lot of pilgrims, who need shelter, food and other necessary supplies. To allow them to visit our local shrines would bring us prestige and perhaps some other incomes...
translation: 凯克其十三神山，是奇琴伊察最大的沼穴，也是诸多神灵的圣陵。吸引了很多朝圣者，这些朝圣者需要住房，食品和其他必要的用品。容许他们进入圣陵我们会给我们带来声望，或许还有一些其他收获。

original: Encourage pilgrims.
Do nothing.
Aluxob

A farmer has managed to set an alux free, neglecting to seal it inside his house after seven years has passed since it was built. This has led to people complaining about missing items, lost animals and smaller injuries caused by the alux.
translation: 一个农民成功的建立一个免费的Alux，在它建立七年后，，没有将它密封进房里。这让人们抱怨这是物品的失踪，动物的失踪和一些小伤害是由Alux造成的。

original: Sacrifice blood to please the alux and seal it inside the house.
translation: 用血祭取悦阿历克斯并将他密封在房里

original: Don't bother me with such trivialities!
translation: 别用这样的琐事打扰我！

original: Luck or Chaos?

A peculiar man asks you for offerings as you were traveling through your kingdom. You have a faint suspicion that this might be an alux, who will wreak havoc and spread illness if their demand is refused. If they are given what they want, the alux will protect from thieves and bring luck.
translation: 一个奇怪的人要求游遍你的王国。你怀疑他是Alux，如果拒绝他的要求，他会大肆破坏并传播疾病。如果给他们想要，Alux将保护你远离小偷并带来好运。

original: Give him less than he wants and send him away.
translation: 给他比他期望得到的少并将他送回去。

original: Give him what he asks for.
Deny him the gold.
Hero Twins

A dream about the Hero twins, who were conceived when their mother spoke to a severed head who spat upon her hand. That severed head was their father, who together with his brother was summoned to Xibalba after their ball game had disturbed the peace of the Lords of the Underworld. The twins had many adventures before they themselves were summoned to Xibalba as their ball game disturbed the lords once again. The dream was about the many trials the twins faced before they reached the Lords of the Underground, and how they managed to defeat the lords. The dream ended when the twins transformed into the sun and moon which is a sign that a new age is beginning.
translation: 英雄双胞胎做了一个梦，这对双胞胎是这样生来的：他们母亲与一个被砍掉的头颅对话，然后头颅的唾沫吐在了母亲手上，从而受孕。这个被砍掉的头颅是他们的父亲，同他兄弟一同被召唤到了冥界西瓦尔巴，因为双胞胎玩球打扰了冥界之主们的安宁。双胞胎则历经无数奇遇之后，也被召唤到了西瓦儿巴，因为他们玩球再度打扰了冥界之主的安宁。梦境是关于双胞胎与冥界之主们见面之前所受到的许多审判。梦境结尾，双胞胎变成了太阳和月亮，预示着新时代的开始。

original: Shall we fear it, or welcome it with open arms?
translation: 我们害怕它，或敞开双臂迎接它呢？

original: Hot Embers and Cold Evil
It is customary that men walk over a bed of glowing embers that represents the fires of the Underworld to ward off evil during the year, but the smell of sizzling feet is not attractive.
translation: 有这样一种习俗即男子走在一层炽热的灰烬代表地狱火挡在住今年的邪恶，但脚燃烧的味道并不好闻。

original: Let my heir do it.
Of course I'll do it!
Wayob

Letting your blood flow into the bowl and then burning the paper stained with your blood brings a vision to your eyes. The Vision Snake shows you a wayob, caster of disease and fever, with a jar of darkness in its hands spewing snakes and insects.
translation: 亲眼看着你的血液流到碗里然后点燃沾满鲜血的纸。向你启示了一个wayob，疾病和发热的灾难，浓浓的黑暗中喷出的蛇和昆虫。

original: It's an omen!
Sacrificial Traditions

It is time to decide how we should sacrifice the human offerings and there are several different ways to choose from. Decapitation, heart extraction, arrow sacrifice, disembowelment or throwing the offering into a cenote. What should we choose? The decapitation of the offering is done in a ritual reenactment of the decapitation of the Maya maize god by the Maya death gods, while the heart extraction is inspired by the Aztecs. The heart is pulled out while it is still beating, blood smeared upon the image of the temple's deity and the corpse skinned. The arrow sacrifice begins with the offering being painted blue with a white symbol over its chest, then bound to a stake during a ritual dance while wearing a peaked cap. Blood is drawn and smeared upon the deity's image and the dancers then takes turn shooting arrows at the offering until its whole chest is filled with arrows. Disembowelment is a slower death but not as elaborate, a sacrifice is bound to a stake with his hands tied behind his head and then disemboweled. The offerings can also be thrown into our Sacred Cenote.
translation: 是时候来决定我们应该如何进行祭并且有几个不同的方式可供选择。斩首，挖取心脏，箭祭，剖腹或将祭品投入洞穴。我们应该选择什么？对祭品的斩首是对玛雅死神斩杀玛雅玉米神的再现，心挖心的灵感来自阿兹特克人。心被拉出时它还在跳动，血抹在寺庙的神像上和尸体皮肤上。箭祭则是将祭品漆成蓝色，在其胸部画上白色符号，然后在带着戴着鸭舌帽进行仪式舞蹈时进行绑定到木桩上。鲜血涂抹在神像上然后舞者轮流射击祭品，直到其整个胸部充满箭头。剖腹是一个缓慢的死亡但并不复杂，祭品被双手反绑在背后，然后固定在木桩上。还可以将祭品投入我们神圣的洞穴。

original: Decapitate them!
Extract their heart.
Arrow sacrifice!
Disembowel them!
Hurl them into a cenote!
Ixtab

Our country is suffering and our priests have started suggesting that honoring Ixtab would be a good idea. Rope Woman, as she is also called, is the goddess of suicide and will accompany those who die by hanging to paradise. It is an honorable way to die and those who choose it will join people who died as soldiers or as sacrificial victims, women who died in childbirth and members of the priesthood. These enjoy a delectable existence and are rewarded with delicious food and drink. Wouldn't it be preferable to the chaos your country is currently experiencing, to rest instead under the shade of a pleasant tree, free from all want?
translation: 我国正在遭受苦难，我们的牧师建议祭拜伊休妲会是个不错的主意。她也被称为绳之女人，她是是自杀的女神和陪伴那些上吊而死的人到天堂。这是一种光荣的死法，那些选择这种死法的人将和死亡的士兵，作为祭品的受害者，在分娩时死亡的妇女和死亡的神职人员并列。这些人将享受极乐般的存在并且享受美味的食物和饮料作为奖励。这不比你的国家目前经历的混乱更好？在快乐之树下休息一下，摆脱了一切烦思。

original: Sacrifice [Root.Heir.GetName]
Sacrifice yourself.
Find another solution.
Lack of Quetzal feathers

Quetzal feathers are lacking and the fire deity Tohil, the sun god and the god of rain, cannot be properly celebrated unless quetzal feathers are sacrificed to him. He is our god of war, sacrifice and sustenance, and we do not wish his anger upon us. Traders have told us that there are Quetzal feathers in abundance in a neighboring country, and we should send someone to purchase the feathers from them.
translation: 绿咬鹃羽毛的缺乏，使得对火神，太阳神、雨神图伊尔的庆典难以恰当的进行。除非能够将绿咬鹃羽毛献祭给他。图伊尔是我们的战争，祭司与丰收之神，我们不希望他的愤怒降临在我们身上。贸易员告诉我们有一个周边国家绿咬鹃羽毛数量很大，我们应该派人去从他们购买的羽毛。

original: Yes, send a trader to them.
translation: 是的，派一个交易者去他们那。

original: No, send out our hunters instead.
translation: 不，把我们的猎人派出去。

original: Trade with Quetzal feathers
$FROMCOUNTRY$ is desperate for quetzal feathers which are offered to Tohil, god of war, sacrifice and sustenance, a fire deity, sun god and god of rain. They wish to purchase feathers from us.
translation: $FROMCOUNTRY$ 极度渴望用于取悦战争，祭司与丰收之神同样是火之神，太阳神与雨神的图伊尔的的绿咬鹃羽毛。他们希望从我们这里购买的羽毛。

original: Trade with them.
Refuse.
Tradeoffer accepted
$FROMCOUNTRY$ agreed to trade with us, now we have the quetzal feathers we need to please Tohil!
translation: $FROMCOUNTRY$ 同意与我们进行交易，我们将从他们购买的绿咬鹃羽毛以取悦图伊尔。

original: Good, they are a true friend.
translation: 好的，他们是一个真正的朋友。

original: Tradeoffer refused
$FROMCOUNTRY$ refused to trade with us, we will not be able to purchase quetzal feathers from them.
translation: $FROMCOUNTRY$ 拒绝与我们进行交易，我们将无法从他们购买的绿咬鹃羽毛

original: Too bad.
Ek Chuaj
A magnificent statue of Ek Chuaj, god of traders and cocoa, has been given to you. It is said to increase productivity and the amount of cacao beans harvested each year.
translation: 商业之神艾克·曲瓦的宏伟雕像与可可豆被赋予你. 据说这可以提高生产率和可可豆的每年收获数量。

original: Place it in a province.
Sell it.
Bloodletting
The sacrifice of blood is believed to nourish and propitiate, and the Maya elite are obsessed with blood. Ritual bloodletting was a major part of any important calendar event.
translation: 鲜血献祭可以滋养和抚慰人心，玛雅的统治者痴迷于此。放血仪式在所有历法中都是最重要的部分。

original: Cycle of Creation and Chaos
The gods and other forces of creation and chaos do battle in the world of mortals, determining the fate of all earthly creatures.
translation: 神与诸如创造与混沌之力在凡间彼此争斗着，以决定地上所有生物的命运。

original: Pilgrimages
People traveling to sacred places such as the Q'eqchi' thirteen sacred mountains or the large cenote in Chichen Itza has found a new place to visit during their pilgrimages in our provinces.
translation: 在我们的领地上朝圣时，人们在前往圣地的途中发现了一个个新的名胜，诸如Q'eqchi'十三座神圣的山或奇琴伊察的大沼穴。

original: Walking on Embers
Another year has been warded from evil by men walking over a bed of glowing embers that represents the fires of the Underworld.
translation: 一年后，邪恶的男人已获得走在床上表示冥界之火的发光余烬。

original: Trade with Quetzal feathers
translation: 使用绿咬鹃羽毛进行贸易

original: No trade with Quetzal feathers
translation: 不使用绿咬鹃羽毛进行贸易

original: Ek Chuaj
The god of traders and cocoa Ek Chuaj carries a spear, a scorpion's tail and a merchant's pack filled with goods.
translation: 贸易和可可之神艾克·曲瓦，携带一根矛，一只蝎子的尾巴和一个里面装满货物的商人的袋子。

original: Efficient Tax Administration
We have found a more efficient way to administer our taxes, which makes it so much easier to take gold from the rich and the poor alike.
translation: 我们已经发现了一种更有效的方式来管理我们的税收，这使得从富人和穷人手中收取黄金变得容易得多。

original: Encourage Production

The carrot and the stick work on the stubborn donkey, but our idea to encourage production takes this a step further. We have managed to increase our production efficiency greatly through something more ingenious. Although you should never underestimate the carrot, nor the stick.
translation: 胡萝卜加大帮的政策对犟驴是有效的，但我们若想促进生产就需要更进一步！我们已经巧妙地、极大地提高了生产效率。虽然你从未低估胡萝卜亦或大棒的作用。

original: Guaranteed Freedoms
Certain freedoms are guaranteed and our ordinarily restless subjects now find it more difficult to protest against our rule.
translation: 有限的自由被保证，不安的寻常百姓现在发现抗议我们的规则变得更加困难。

original: Continuity

People claim they want adventure and passion in their lives, but when push comes to shove it is stability everyone secretly craves. A bit of continuity makes people sleep well in their beds, certain of what the future holds for them.
translation: 人民声称他们希望生活充满刺激和惊险，但当事态严重时每个人内心都渴望稳定。一些延续性可使得他们能在床上睡个好觉，给他们一个可以预见的未来。

original: State Missionary Schools

Missionary schools train people to go out and spread the true faith without fail. The State Missionary School is no different, but for the fact the state itself educates the ones she wishes to send out on this holy quest.
translation: 教会学校训练修士们出外成功地传播真神的信仰。国家教会学校没有什么区别，但是从这里出来的人比普通修士更加的聪明，效率更高。

original: Standardized Currency

A coinage with a standardized weight and produced in a special mint to ensure that they all look and weigh the same works wonders for trade. No longer do the merchants feel cheated - at least not because the coin they trade with contains more or less gold or silver - and the whole country shares the same standardized currency.
translation: 在造币时统一货币的重量并采用一种特殊的方法进行制造来确保货币的重量与模样相同的货币相当受到商人们的喜爱。商人们不再觉得他们受到了诈骗 - 而这并不是因为硬币里的含金和银的成分增加或者减少了 - 全国都在统一使用标准货币。

original: Financial Regulations
Giving money-lenders and bankers certain requirements and guidelines keeps them honest and leads to prosperity and financial growth.
translation: 给予债主与银行家一些要求与准则，让他们依法办事，这促进了经济的繁荣与增长。

original: Expand Financial Markets
Allowing people to buy things on credit has caused trade to flourish, our people and merchants are getting richer each day.
translation: 允许人们以信用交换商品极大地促进了贸易的繁荣，我们的人民与商人正向富裕迈去。

original: Competitive Builders

By allowing builders to bid for construction contracts rather than simply repeatedly hiring the same workers, competition among builders and their eagerness to be hired decreases the overall build cost of structures.
translation: 通过允许建筑工人与建筑商们自行签订合同，而不是简单地重复雇用同一劳动者，建筑者们之间的竞争和他们渴望被雇佣的心情大大的减少了建筑物的整体花费成本。

original: State Architects

The state architects scrutinize each building contract, each blueprint, and each building's plan before it is accepted and the builders can start working. It relieves the ruling class from this task and lessens the Monarch Power cost of each building.
translation: 国家建筑师仔细检查每一处建造合同，每一个蓝图，每一个建筑物前，他和建筑工人开始建筑工作计划。它减轻了君主的这个建造任务，减轻每个建筑君主所花费成本。

original: Zealous Missionaries
Our missionaries preach with a fervor never before seen, and no one may evade their lectures delivered with the fire of a true believer.
translation: 我们的传教士布道的热情之前从未见过,也没有人可以逃避他们的授课的真理之火。

original: Patronize Local Artists
The support, encouragement, privilege, and financial aid we bestow upon local artists mark us as a progressive and cultural nation.
translation: 支持、鼓励、特权和财务给予给当地艺术家，这是一个进步的文化国家的标志。

original: Lasting Prestige
Lying: Preventing our prestige from decreasing has never been easier!
translation: 谎言:为了防止我们的声望下降，这从来都不是一件容易的事！

original: Legitimate Rule
Surely no one ever doubted that we would be the legitimate ruler of our country - but if anyone did, this will silence their doubts.
translation: 肯定没有人怀疑我是我国的合法统治者——但是如果有人这么想，这也会使他们沉默，不在怀疑。

original: Religious Traditions
Our state has a long and proud tradition of serving god, strengthening the devotion of our rulers and ensuring that we act justly and rightly according to the will of the spiritual realm.
translation: 我们的国家有着悠久而光荣的为上帝服务的传统。根据神的意志，加强我们统治者的献身精神，并确保我们的行为是公正和正确的.

original: Unite the Clans

Our state is built on the proud traditions of multiple clans that have come together to create a great horde. As such we are able to keep together even in harsher times to a higher degree than some other hordes.
translation: 我们的国家是建立在众多拥有光荣传统的部落联合建立的伟大部落之上的。因此即使在最困难的时代我们也能比其他部落更加伟大.

original: Republican Ethos
Republican tradition flows though the very veins of every citizen of our nation, they rejoice in their freedom and independence.
translation: 共和传统在我国每位公民的每根血管中流淌，公民们都为自己的自由与独立而欢呼雀跃。

original: Scientific Heritage
Our land has a long tradition of scientific enquiry. By making sure our heritage in science is explored, encouraged, and exposed, we will see our future in technology secured and within easy grasp.
translation: 我们的土地有科学询问的传统。确定科学的我们的遗产被探究、鼓励、和暴露的，我们将会在被保护的技术方面和在容易把握里面见到我们的未来。

original: Court Philosophers
By patronizing freethinking philosophers at our court we can ensure that our nation is ready to adapt to whatever the future may throw at us.
translation: 让那些带有自由思想的哲学家来光顾我们的法院可以确保我们的国度能够面对任何奇葩的未来。

original: Tradition of Service
The children of our advisors shall follow in their parents' footsteps, ensuring us that we will never lack advisors of any sort.
translation: 我们顾问的孩子们应当追随他们父辈的道路，以确保我们永远不会缺乏任何类型的顾问。

original: Grand Court
The larger the court, the more advisors are demanded. Our Grand Court might be the largest of them all, and this is reflected by the amount of advisors seeking a place at our court.
translation: 礼堂越大，就有越多的人愿意加入，我们的法院可能是所有当中最大的，而这也会被院里的成员数量所影响。

original: The Pious State
The state and the church are one and the same, religious rules and teachings will be imposed on all citizens.
translation: 国家与教会合一，教法与教化将传播到每个国民。

original: Tolerate the Heretics
Priests and other pious people might protest, but the ones that do not share our faith, the true one, will be more comfortable in our land.
translation: 牧师和其他虔诚的人可能会有抗议，但那些非我们信仰之人，正确的人，将会更舒服在我们的土地上生存。

original: Increase Secularism

The state separated from religious institutions and dignitaries asserts the right to be free from religious rules and teachings. If - or when - we declare our state to be neutral on matters of belief the people will have a right to be free from the imposition by government of religion or religious practices upon its people. Ergo: Heathens will be happier in our country.
translation: 国家的宗教机构与政治必须分开，不再被宗教规则所限制。如果-或者当-我们宣布我们的国家将保持中立，所有的信仰将是被允许的，国家政治将不在被宗教所限制。因此，异教徒将享受平等的待遇并且更加幸福。

original: Increased Issues

A ruler must have an heir, and recent research has listed multiple ways to ensure that a child will be born to the ruler and their spouse: Adoption, more royal marriages, or perhaps a mistress or two to ensure a legitimate heir are the options now available.
translation: 一个君主必须拥有一个继承人，而最近的研究已经列出了许多方法确保君主与他的妻子将会拥有一个婴儿：通过，更多的王室联姻，又或者一个或两个情妇来确保能够继承王位的合法继承人存在。

original: Local Patriotism
A stronger devotion and cultural attachment to our country will stop those who seek to place their own Core in our beloved provinces.
translation: 一个强大的贡献精神主义与文化的意识在我们国内蔓延能够很好的制止那些试图在我们的省份里制造核心的敌人。

original: Patriotic Propaganda

Conquering provinces from another country often leads to unrest and a plague of revolts. With our new propaganda we will ensure that the inhabitants will accept our country, our rule, and our traditions faster than before.
translation: 征服另外一个国家的省份可能会导致动乱与叛乱在我们的国家的蔓延。但在我们的宣传下这些新的居民将比从前更快的接受我们的国度，法律和文化。

original: Mercantile Agreements

Having a mercantile agreement with our vassals ensure that their income will increase as other nations' merchants and traders will be forced to follow our standards. This will also increase the income our country gains from them.
translation: 与我们的附庸达成商业协议，确保他们的收入将上涨，而其他国家商人的收入将与我们的标准强制持平。此举也将增加我们从附庸处所得的收入。

original: United in Faith
Despite the many differences in traditions, cultures, and various other things, we know that we are united under one faith, one religion, one powerful reason to stay together.
translation: 尽管我们的传统，文化以及许多其他的东西都有着不同的差异，但是我们都知道，我们在一个统一的信仰，宗教，以及一大强大的理由下聚集在一起。

original: Stronger Global Government

Before this idea took power, the provinces craved more autonomy than we were willing to give them and local rule was strongly sought after. Though this thirst for self-rule hasn't been sated, this idea has quenched it at least a little.
translation: 在这一理念成为主流以前，地方自治是人们强烈追逐的目标，各个省份对自治权的渴求远在我们愿意给予的程度之上。如今虽然地方自治的渴望还没有完全被人们厌腻，但是这一理念多少让人们对它的热情冷却了许多。

original: Cultural Acceptance
Conquering provinces leads to many interesting cultural clashes, but with a touch of understanding and a sprinkle of tolerance we can live together peacefully, no matter our culture.
translation: 征服越来越多的省份会带来许多值得关注的文化冲突，然而只要多一些理解和容忍，我们依然可以和平地生活在一起，无论来自哪个文化。

original: Cultural Assimilation

Other cultures may contain elements we do not wish to adopt, or be less tolerant of our own traditions. To fully assimilate another culture we need to understand them and show them the faults of their ways.
translation: 其他的文化可能有着我们无法接受的元素，或者无法容忍我们自己的传统。要完全同化一个其他文化我们需要理解他们并让他们发现自己习俗的缺点。

original: Naval Principles

As we expand our navy and train more sailors we need a proper code of conduct, a set of rules to make sure that the crew of the ships knew what is acceptable and what is not. This was initially an unwelcome idea, but it turns out that it has increased the morale of our navies.
translation: 随着我们扩张海军并训练越来越多的税收，我们需要一套良好的行为规范，一套让船员们明白什么可以接受而什么不能的条例。这一想法起先并不受到欢迎，然而最终它提高了我们海军的士气。

original: Evolving Trade

Trade and bartering have always existed, but it has not always been very efficient. People used to directly exchange goods and services for other goods and services but now, with our modern trade practices, goods and services are negotiated through a medium of exchange: Money.
translation: 贸易从很久以前就存在，但并不总是很有效率。人们曾经直接用商品和服务交换其他人的商品和服务。但现在，在我们的现代商业实践中，商品和服务则通过一个媒介进行交换：金钱。

original: Mercantile System
An economic theory and practice that has brought many a fortune to other nations has now been adopted by us.
translation: 我们接受了一套已经让许多其他国家大发利市的经济理论和实践。

original: Mercantile Seminars

In order to ensure that all our merchants, traders, and other members of the trading class are skilled in the art of bartering we have organized seminars in our provinces. Anyone who participates will learn the great art of trading.
translation: 为了让我们的商人、交易员以及其他所有贸易阶层的成员成为娴熟的贸易者，我们在各个省份中组织了研讨会。任何参加的人都会了解到伟大的贸易之道。

original: Mercantile Theories

Some say that steering trade to your favor is an art, others say that it is a science. Many of our great scholars are now studying trade steering and giving advice to our merchants. It has led to us being more able to steer trade, much to our delight.
translation: 有些人说通过操纵贸易流向获利是一门艺术，也有人说这是一门科学。我们的许多伟大的学者正在研究贸易操纵并给商人们提供建议。很令人高兴的是，这已经提高了我们操纵贸易的能力。

original: Bureau of Colonial Affairs
Having a Bureau of Colonial Affairs allows us to forward all those pesky problems any colony might come up with to skilled and trained specialists.
translation: 建立一个殖民地事务局使得我们得以让训练有素的专家们来处理那些殖民地可能发生的麻烦问题。

original: Charismatic Diplomats
Promoting those among our diplomats who can charm anyone into agreement will potentially increase our diplomatic reputation significantly.
translation: 通过晋升外交官中那些可以通过魅力取得别人支持的人才，我们的外交声望大大提高了。

original: Office of Foreign Affairs
Our new office will take care of all our foreign affairs and diplomatic upkeep.
translation: 新成立的机构将为我们处理所有对外事务和维护外交关系。

original: State Business School

Mathematics, diplomatic skill, leadership and charisma... all important skills a successful merchant needs. Instead of sending out people who only know of trade what their master taught them, we can now provide our country with top-of-their-class merchants.
translation: 数学、交涉技巧、领导力以及魅力……所有这些技能都是一个成功商人所必须的。现在我们派出的将不再是对贸易所知仅限于学徒时代从师傅那里学到的经验的贸易者，而是冠绝其类的优秀商人。

original: Experienced Settlers

People who once moved from our great nation to join others searching for the land of opportunity have great experience in what is needed to create a colony and make it thrive. With a bit of persuasion, and promise of gold, some settlers have agreed to work for us as colonial guides.
translation: 那些有着曾经背井离乡前往异域寻找机遇经历的人们对于建立一个殖民地并使其繁荣所需的条件知之甚详。晓之以情，动之以利，我们得以说服一些移民以殖民顾问的身份为我们工作。

original: Diplomatic Education

Though we have always had great diplomats, a way to educate those selected few to serve us even better can never be wrong. The elite, the best and the brightest, will flock to our education in order to prove themselves and be selected to represent us in various diplomatic actions.
translation: 尽管我们有着很好的外交官，能有让少数精挑细选出来的人才更好地为我们服务的办法永远不会是坏事。精英，最好和最聪明的人将涌向我们的教育机构，希冀通过证明自己来被选中成为在外交行动中代表我们国家的人物。

original: Naval Conscription

With the promise of gold, promotions, and long leave of absence, we have awoken many a man's desire to see more of the world and get paid for it. But if that doesn't bring enough recruits, we can always round up some drunks and drag them to sea. Our ships will have full crews in no time!
translation: 通过金钱、晋升和长假待遇，我们已经唤起了许多男人们对见识更广阔的世界并以此谋生渴望。但如果这还不能给我们带来足够的兵员的话，我们总是可以从街上逮住一帮醉汉扔上船。我们的舰队马上就能满员出航！

original: National Dockyards
Ships need a safe haven when they are not in use, where they can be restored to their former glory or just have their holes patched up. This they will find in our national dockyards.
translation: 舰船在平时需要一个安全港，可以让它们恢复过往荣耀，或者仅仅是在此补上破洞。这些功能都可以在我们的国家造船厂做到。

original: Reinforced Hulls
For a ship to float, its weight must be less than that of the water displaced by the ship's hull. The recent improvements to our ships' hulls has both made them lighter and improved their durability.
translation: 船如果想要漂浮在水上，它的重量必须轻于船体所排开水体的重量（阿基米德原理）。最近我们船体材料技术的进步可以让我们的船更加轻便，同时也更加坚固。

original: National Pride

War is always exhausting, for the land's resources, its people, and perhaps most of all for its soldiers. By involving everyone, from young to old, man and woman, rich and poor, to help defend against the enemy, a sense of belonging has grasped the nation and people will endure wars better.
translation: 战争总是让人筋疲力竭，对国家的资源，人民，尤其是士兵们都是如此。通过让所有国民，无分男女老幼，贫富贵贱，都参与到对抗敌人的行动中，对祖国的认同感正在席卷全国，国民可以更好地忍受战时的不便。

original: Tactical War
Before a war has even started, battle plans, tactical advantages, and various strategies will be reviewed and discussed in order to make the loss of soldiers and supplies as low as possible.
translation: 战争开始之前，精心谋划，改进战术，探讨不同的战略，这样可以使得我们的损失降到最低。

original: Naval Laws

Just as any gentleman will tell you, a set of unspoken laws decreeing how to behave and act in different circumstances will guarantee that you will never feel uncertain. This has been applied to our navy, and while our sailors might grumble they ultimately follow the laws.
translation: 每个绅士都会告诉你，一套不成文法用于规范在不同情景下的行为可以保证你永远不会疑惑。这项法律已经在我们的海军中颁布，我们的水手也许会抱怨，但最终他们都会遵循。

original: Naval Pride
A new order, created to give our sailors and marines a sense of pride and dedication, will lead to a large increase in our naval tradition.
translation: 一款新的勋章，为了鼓励我们的海军有更高的荣誉感和奉献精神而创设。这将大大增加我们的海军传统。

original: Naval Gunners

Our navies have new, standardized teams lead by naval gunnery officers. These men have great knowledge of naval battle and know how to employ cannons in the best tactical and strategical manner possible.
translation: 我们的海军拥有一个全新的标准化的队伍，由海军射击官所带领。这些人有着丰富的海战知识，他们知道如何使用舰炮来获得最佳的战术和战略效果。

original: Advanced Boarding Techniques

While Boarding has long been a part of naval warfare, our captains and crews go about it more vigorously than most. By fearlessly closing the distance and fiercely attacking, our navy is gaining a reputation for their Shock tactics.
translation: 登船近战传统上就是海战战术中的重要部分，我们的船长和船员对此比谁都投入。无畏地接敌，迅猛地攻击，我们的海军以他们的冲击战术赢得了广泛的声誉。

original: Excellent Shipwrights
By gathering the best shipbuilders our nation has to offer, we are able to build us a fleet of modern vessels unmatched in craftsmanship and maneuverability.
translation: 在海战中，海风，海浪以及舵手的灵活操作将是决定胜负的关键。海战中的走位决定战斗结果，到底是我方还是敌方的船只沉入大海。

original: Undercover Operations
While being undercover, our spies are shielded from suspicion and will be able to perform operations of sabotage with less effort.
translation: 通过伪装身份，我们的间谍可以免遭怀疑，这样从事破坏行为的代价会减少很多。

original: Enemy Infiltration
Our spies will attempt to infiltrate the enemy's spy force to jumble information and make sure their government doesn't receive any sensitive intelligence about our country.
translation: 我们的间谍可以渗透入敌方的情报组织，混乱他们所收到的信息，保证他们的政府不能得到有关我们国家有价值的情报。

original: Experienced Shipwrights

A large navy demands many shipyards and experienced shipwrights. For every ship we build, be it war ships or transports, our shipwrights gain knowledge and experience leading to faster ways of constructing ships of all sorts.
translation: 大规模的海军需要许多造船厂和有经验的船匠。我们建造每一艘船，无论是战船还是运输船，船匠都可以从中获取造船经验。

original: Standardized Blockades
The new standardized blockade force has already proven to be overwhelmingly positive, it has made our blockades much more efficient.
translation: 最新的标准化封锁船队被证明效果卓著，这大大提高了我们的封锁效率

original: Efficient Embargoes
Decreasing other nation's trade power has never been easier.
translation: 削减其他国家的贸易竞争力从来不是件容易事。

original: Naval Grandeur
Our adversaries already fear our army, now they also tremble at the mention of our grand navy!
translation: 我们的敌人已经够害怕我们的陆军了，现在他们提到我们的宏伟海军时也忍不住发抖！

original: Superior Provisions
By ensuring that our colonists have access to higher quality provisions we can increase the distance they can travel by sea without resupplying.
translation: 通过确保我们的殖民者能获得高质量的补给，我们可以增加他们的探险距离。

original: Promise of Land
The simple promise of a piece of land of their own has convinced people to move to our colonies.
translation: 一个很简单的许诺：给他们自己的土地，就可以吸引人们源源不断地来到我们的殖民地

original: Refined Propaganda
We have refined our propaganda to make people ignore, or at least accept, our aggressive expansion.
translation: 我们通过加强我们的宣传技巧来使得人们忽略，或者至少接受我们的扩张。

original: Competent Privateers
The step from mere pirates to competent privateers has been a long and hard one, but one we managed to take in our stride.
translation: 很久以来很少有海盗能够在私掠的道路上取得长久的成功，但我们跨出了这重要的一步。

original: Supported Assimilation

Instead of forcing people to assimilate we show them that our shared interests, sometimes even religious and cultural similarities, will make the assimilation of their provinces into our country a profitable venture.
translation: 与其强制要求他们同化，我们展示给他们我们共同的利益，有时是宗教和文化上的相似性。来让他们知道跟我国合并是有利可图的。

original: Protected Oak Forests
Ensure that our oak forests are protected by the state, so that we have access to cheap oak wood for ship hulls.
translation: 确保我们的橡树林收到国家保护，这样我们就可以有便宜的橡木用于建造船只。

original: Naval Engineering
The design of a light ship is not just about its purpose, a naval engineer needs to consider the design, construction, maintenance, and operation of the ship as well.
translation: 要设计一艘轻型船不只是设计他的功能，一个好的工程师需要同时考虑它的设计，建造，维持和运作。

original: National Arsenal
Establish a national arsenal where our galleys can be produced quickly and cheaply according to standard designs.
translation: 通过建造一所国家兵工厂，我们的盖伦帆船可以使用标准化流程又快又好地建造好。

original: State Naval Architect
Employing a naval architect at our court enables us to lower the costs of constructing transport ships.
translation: 通过雇佣国家造船工程师可以减少建造运输船的费用。

original: Broadside Firing Drills
Firing a broadside requires highly a trained crew who are able to quickly reload and fire in unity. Regular drills will ensure our ships have such crew.
translation: 从船侧开火需要高技巧的船员，他们要能快速整齐地重填弹药。定期训练能使我们的拥有这样的船员。

original: Double Shot

The light ships are faster but have fewer gun ports than other war ships. While the new practice of loading two round shots into one gun and firing them both at once mean the ships have a lower effective range and accuracy, it is devastating at close range.
translation: 轻型战船速度更快，但是比起其它战船而言炮位较少。新的实验将两轮炮弹塞在同一个炮管中，让它们同时发射，尽管会牺牲有效距离和精度，但在近战中会非常有威力。

original: Gunlocks
The flintlock mechanism used on muskets and rifles has been adapted to use on cannons, so-called gunlocks. These are safer than the old method of linstocks to fire the cannon.
translation: 步枪和来复枪中使用的燧发机制被运用到了火炮中，也就是所谓的炮机。这比过去使用火绳杆来发射要安全。

original: Unit Pride
By encouraging our soldiers to take pride in the units they belong to we can increase their morale and make them fight all that much harder.
translation: 通过鼓励我们的士兵养成所在部队的荣誉感，我们可以增加他们的士气，使他们作战更加勇猛。

original: Military Police
Nobody wants to be punished, but the introduction of military police in our armies has led to a decrease of courts martial and improved our soldiers' discipline.
translation: 没人想被惩罚，但是通过在军中引入宪兵队，减少了军事审判的数量，也增强了我们部队的纪律。

original: Organized Military Bureaucracy
Overhauling and organizing our military bureaucracy was not an easy task, but a necessary one.
translation: 重建并组织化我们军队的官僚机构不是件容易事，但必须要做。

original: Formalized Mercenary Recruiting

Recruiting mercenary has always been a slow and complicated affair, so complicated in fact that relying on our own soldiers has been the better choice many times. By formalizing the recruitment we have bypassed many of the problems and made it easier to recruit mercenaries.
translation: 招募雇佣兵一直都是个缓慢复杂的事务，它是如此的缓慢以至于很多时候依赖我们的正规军是更好的选择。通过正规化我们的雇佣流程，我们克服了这些困难，现在招募雇佣兵更加容易了。

original: Titles for Mercenaries
Granting titles for mercenary commanders ensure that we get the best soldiers for a fair price, which lowers the maintenance cost of mercenaries.
translation: 通过给予雇佣兵指挥官头衔我们可以以公平的价格获得最好的士兵，这样可以降低他们的维持费用。

original: Mercenary Recruitment Centers
Creating centers all over our country for the recruitment of mercenaries has increased the amount of mercenary companies available to us.
translation: 在全国各地设立雇佣兵招募中心增加了我们能够雇佣的数量。

original: Establish National Army
A national army would mean that we no longer have to rely on mercenaries or private armies when at war, and that we can create larger armies with more soldiers.
translation: 军队国家化代表我们在战时不再依赖雇佣兵或者私兵，这样我们可以建立一支更大的军队。

original: Peasant Conscription
No matter if you are rich or poor, you can always fight. Conscripting peasants might not be seen with pleasure by our noble soldiers, but it will increase our manpower.
translation: 无论贵贱，你都能上战场。征召农民入伍可能不会让贵族士兵开心，但肯定会增加我们的人力。

original: Local Recruitment Centers
Recruitment centers enable us to recruit soldiers directly from each province. Instead of having them travel to us, we will come to them.
translation: 在各地设立招募中心可以让我们直接从各省份招募兵员。与其让他们自己过来，我们直接走向各地。

original: Organized Logistics
The management of supplies was a disorganized mess until we created a system for organized logistics.
translation: 后勤补给过去是一团糟，直到我们创建了一个组织化的后勤系统。

original: Scorched Earth Policy
Our military has strict orders to destroy anything that might be useful to the enemy, such as food sources or transportation, while withdrawing from an area.
translation: 我们军队有着严格的命令，当从一块区域撤退时，摧毁一切可能资敌的东西，比如食物资源或是运输线。

original: Meritocratic Promotions
The old way of promoting those of noble blood has been discarded in favor for promotions made by merit.
translation: 过去以血统晋升的体系已经被抛弃，现在是以功劳论英雄的时代。

original: Establish Officer Schools
Those who show great promise or great eagerness in leading troops are now able to enrol in an Officer school, which will teach them how to act as an officer and a gentleman.
translation: 那些拥有指挥军队的过人天赋和热情的人现在可以加入一所军官学校，在那里可以学习如何成为一个出色的军官和绅士。

original: Rifle Drills
'Give a man a gun, and he'll be able to defend himself for a day. Teach a man to use a rifle, and he'll never be defenseless again.'
translation: ‘给他一杆枪，可以让他自保一天。教会他如何使用来福枪，他将不再无助。’

original: Cavalry Officers
Men on horses need a leader just as much as the man walking, and promoting men to the rank of officers amongst the cavalry will only make them better.
translation: 骑兵和步兵一样需要指挥官，把一些人提升到军官位置只会让他们更加出色。

original: Army Scouts
Scouts are sent out into unfamiliar regions to explore and gain vital information about enemy forces, the environment, and the terrain.
translation: 将侦察兵派往位置区域，可以探索获取敌人兵力以及环境地形等重要信息。

original: Siege Tactics
Whoever thought sieges was a clever way to wage war might be a genius, or an idiot. With improved siege tactics, however, our officers will fare better in sieges.
translation: 想出围城来加速战争进程的要么就是个天才，要么就是个傻瓜。通过提升战术，我们的指挥官现在有很高的围城技巧。

original: Rapid Recruiting
The faster we can recruit, the faster we can reinforce our armies.
translation: 我们招募得越快，军队恢复的速度也越快。

original: Monuments to Victory
Our victories shall be celebrated with great monuments that depict whoever helped us claim victory or lead us on the path of glory.
translation: 我们的胜利必须用建造一座纪念碑来彰显，刻上所有有功之人的名字，记录通往胜利的路程。

original: Fortification Construction Standards
One of the most important things when defending our country is our forts. The construction standard for fortifications will make it harder for our enemies to take control of our provinces.
translation: 防御我们国家的重点之一就是要塞。通过建设标准化要塞可以让敌军在进攻时遭遇更大困难。

original: Sappers

Sieges are won by patience and ingenuity. Sappers bring both to a siege, with their duties devoted to tasks involving facilitating movement, defense, and the survival of allied forces and impeding those of enemies.
translation: 围城靠耐心和技术取胜。工兵可以在围城中做到以上两点。他们的任务包括快速移动，防守直到援军到来，以及妨碍敌军。

original: Vassal Levy System
One benefit of having vassals is that they help expand our armies significantly, and with the Vassal Levy System our benefits will be even greater.
translation: 拥有附庸的一个好处就是可以大规模地扩充我们的军队，通过附庸征兵制度我们可以做得更好。

original: Veteran Sergeants
Sergeants are the true leaders of armies — the officers are there just to prevent warfare becoming a mere squabble between peasants.
translation: 老兵是军队真正的领袖。军官只不过是防止农民吵嘴的角色。

original: Fine Horse Breeding
Any horseman will tell you that the quality of the horse is as important as the quality of the equestrian - oftentimes even more so.
translation: 任何一个旗兵都会告诉你军马的质量和骑兵一样重要，很多时候甚至更加重要。

original: High Quality Ammunition
The better the ammunition, the better the power of our muskets and cannons.
translation: 弹药质量越好，我们滑膛枪和大炮的威力越大。

original: Mass Conscription
Compulsory enlisting of people into military service by mass conscription lowers the cost of infantry.
translation: 大规模征召义务役入伍可以大幅降低军队维持费用。

original: Land Grants for Cavalrymen
Horses eat grass, grass grows on land, land granted to cavalrymen ensures better cavalry at lower costs.
translation: 马要吃草，草长在地上，给骑兵划拨专门土地可以以更低的成本获得更好的骑兵。

original: Standardized Calibers
The internal diameter of the barrel determines how large projectiles can be, and with a standardized caliber we can produce more cannons and better ammunition for them.
translation: 枪管的口径决定了弹药的大小，通过将口径标准化，我们可以制造更多的火炮，以及更好的弹药。

original: Tlatoani
Tlatoani
Tlatoani
Tlatoani
Tlatoani
Tlatoani
Sacrifice Ruler
Sacrifice Heir
Demanded Sacrifices
Countryside Sorcerer
A sorcerer is said to terrorize the countryside in this province.
translation: 据说一个巫师让这个省份乡下的人们感到恐惧

original: Cholula Temples

The temple complex at Cholula is one of the oldest in Central America and has a special significance for the worship of Quetzalcoatl, the feathered serpent god. Regardless of origin and social stature pilgrims will always be allowed to pass borders unharmed ensuring a steady stream of pilgrims to this holy site.
translation: 位于乔卢拉的神庙群是中美洲最古老的之一，它在羽蛇神崇拜中具有重要意义。无论出身或者社会地位，朝圣者会被允许安全地穿越边界来拜访这一圣地，形成了稳固的朝圣人流。

original: Spying Pochtecas
translation: 波切特卡斯商人的间谍活动

original: By turning a blind eye to even the most obvious and blatant attempts of the foreign Pochteca trade guilds to spy on our state and its forces we have seriously compromised any possibility of counteracting future espionage.
translation: 从睁一只眼闭一只眼到直白的行动，外国的波切特卡斯商人公会对我们国家的间谍行动已经让我们无法容忍，我们保留在未来进行与之针锋相对行动的权力

original: Angered Pochteca Guilds
translation: 愤怒的波切特卡商人公会

original: We have done what we can to limit the ability of foreign Pochteca trade guilds to spy on our state. By doing so, however, we have angered the guilds themselves and as a result our trade income suffers.
translation: 我们已经做了我们所能做的来限制波切特卡商人公会的间谍行为。然而这样做显然激怒了他们，损害了我们的贸易收入。

original: Devastated by Earthquake
This province has been devastated by a major earthquake and is still in the process of rebuilding and recovering.
translation: 这个省份最近毁于一场大地震，目前仍然在重建的漫长进程中。

original: Graced by Xipe-Totec

Through the Grace of Xipe-Totec our people have survived a major earthquake. The Earthquake itself is a reminder that we must never falter in our determination to provide the sacrifices necessary for this age to survive.
translation: 托了剥皮之主-西佩托堤克的鸿福，我们的人民从大地震中幸存下来了。这场地震本身就是一个提醒，让我们不要忘了在这个时代要奉献必要的祭品。

original: Graced by Huitzilopochtli
translation: 被维齐洛波奇特利所祝福

original: Through the Grace of Huitzilopochtli our people have survived a major earthquake. The Earthquake itself is a reminder that we must never falter in our determination to provide the sacrifices necessary for this age to survive.
translation: 托了左蜂鸟-维齐洛波奇特利的鸿福，我们的人民从大地震中幸存下来了。这场地震本身就是一个提醒，让我们不要忘了在这个时代要奉献必要的祭品。

original: Graced by Quetzalcoatl
translation: 被魁札尔科亚特尔所祝福

original: Through the Grace of Quetzalcoatl our people have survived a major earthquake. The Earthquake itself is a reminder that we must never falter in our determination to provide the sacrifices necessary for this age to survive.
translation: 托了羽蛇神-魁札尔科亚特尔的鸿福，我们的人民从大地震中幸存下来了。这场地震本身就是一个提醒，让我们不要忘了在这个时代要奉献必要的祭品。

original: Graced by Tezcatlipoca
translation: 被特斯卡特利波卡所祝福

original: Through the Grace of Tezcatlipoca our people have survived a major earthquake. The Earthquake itself is a reminder that we must never falter in our determination to provide the sacrifices necessary for this age to survive.
translation: 托了烟雾镜-特斯卡特利波卡的鸿福，我们的人民从大地震中幸存下来了。这场地震本身就是一个提醒，让我们不要忘了在这个时代要奉献必要的祭品。

original: Imprisoned Pochtecas
translation: 把波切特卡斯商人关起来

original: Bad Omens

After intense study of the skies and the relevant calendars our priests agree that everything indicates that harsh and troubling times are ahead. As commoners and nobles alike prepare for what is to come many will attempt to save themselves from the bad times by spilling some of their own blood.
translation: 经过对天象和历法的细致研究，我们的祭司们认定一切都在预示着严酷且充满麻烦的时代即将到来。无论平民还是贵族，只有通过挥洒他们自己的鲜血才能拯救他们自己。

original: Ye ica otopan tlamaceuhque.
Our ruler will sacrifice some of his own blood to the gods.
translation: 我们的国王将奉上自己的鲜血。

original: The end is nigh.
Precious Son

Word has reached us of the birth of an exceptional child in [Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]. After almost two days of labor a boy has been born from a commoner woman but astrologers and other diviners agree he is destined for greatness. As is tradition his mother will soon bring him to the house of youth to introduce him to those who will later handle his martial education from puberty to the age of marriage.
translation: 有流言称一个不同寻常的孩子降生在[Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]。一位平民妇女在努力了两天之后生下了这个小孩，我们的占星家和其他占卜者都同意这个孩子注定将不走寻常路。按照传统，他的母亲将把他带到少年学校，那里的人们将对他进行专门的教育，直到他的婚龄到来。

original: The Telpochcalli will make a fine warrior out of him.
translation: 他会在特尔波奇卡尔利成为一位出色的战士。

original: The child will be educated at a Telpochcalli
translation: 这个孩子会在特尔波奇卡尔利接受教育。

original: Attempt to get him into the Calmecac
The child will be educated at the Calmecac, furthering his potential but people will take note of the break with tradition.
translation: 这个孩子会在Calmecac血统学校接受教育，发掘他的潜力，不过人们会认为这是在打破传统。

original: War is thy desert, thy task
translation: 战争是你的奖赏，你的义务。

original: The young boy that was born under such favorable stars 15 years ago has now reached adulthood and the time has come for him to go into battle. As with other boys of his age he is expected to bring back his first prisoners soon, marking the start of his career as a warrior.\nShould any of the boys fail to take a captive they will be forever marked as unfit to be warriors and will have to continue their days as men of little consequence.
translation: 十五年前，这个男孩出生时的星图十分有利，现在他成年了，可以参加战斗了，和同龄者一样，他被期待着带回来他第一个俘虏，作为他战士生涯开始的标志.\n那些没用能够带回俘虏的男孩将终身被认为不适合成为战士，他们将毫无前途。

original: The Omens favor this man, I am sure he will do well.
translation: 预言青睐这个男人，我相信他会做的很好。

original: The Warrior is sent to war to be tested.
translation: 把战士送往战场接受考验。

original: Let us sacrifice some of our blood to aid him.
translation: 让我们牺牲自己的血来帮助他。

original: Thy home is not here, for thou art an eagle, a jaguar
translation: 汝家不在此，因为汝将成为美洲豹战士，或是雕战士

original: Proving all the signs correct the young warrior born all those years ago has already exceeded all expectations. At every opportunity available to him he has taken prisoners and brought great glory to himself and his house. In time he will surely attain the greatest honors a lifetime of battles can bestow.
translation: 所有的事迹都说明了多年前出生的那个少年战士已经超越了所有的期待。他抓住了每个战斗的机会获取俘虏，为他本人和他的家族带来了荣耀。他肯定能取得通过战斗所能获得的所有荣耀。

original: Great!
Thou wilt merit death by the Obsidian Knife.
translation: 黑曜石刀下的名誉处死

original: Despite the very favorable omens it seems the young warrior born all those years ago has been captured by the enemy. Soon he will face his destiny at the sacrificial stone in their capital. While this is an honorable death the disappointment of his house is great.
translation: 尽管有许多有利的预兆，那个多年前出生的男孩最终还是被敌人抓住了。很快的，他将躺在敌人首都的献祭台上，面对他成为牺牲的最终命运。这虽然是个名誉的死法，不过他的家人还是很失望。

original: A worthy death!
Thou shalt give drink, nourishment, food to the sun.
translation: 汝当向太阳献上血肉作为祭品。

original: Despite the favorable omens the young warrior born all those years ago has been slain in the field of battle. He will never become a great warrior now, nor will his heart and blood be sacrificed to the gods.
translation: 尽管有许多有利的预兆，那个多年前出生的男孩最终还是在战场上阵亡了。他永远不能成为一名伟大的战士，他的心脏和血也将不能成为众神的祭品。

original: An unfortunate Death.
Thy home is not here...

Despite the very favorable omens the young boy born all those years ago has proved to be a disappointment to himself and his house. In the face of battle he has proven a coward, staying back and failing to make a single capture despite having multiple opportunities to do so. Upon his return to his warrior house his hair will be cut in a tonsure and he will forever be known as a failed warrior.
translation: 尽管有许多有利的预兆，那个多年前出生的男孩最终还是让他和自己的家族失望了。在战场上他成了一个懦夫，不断地想要撤退，在有多次捕获俘虏的情况下却没有抓到一个。等他回到战士营地的时候他的头发会被削去，他将永远以一个失败的战士身份活在世上。

original: Ok.
Ok.
Good Omens

After intense study of the stars, the relevant calendars, and other signs known to our priests it is clear to them that good times are ahead. As the destruction of the world cannot be imminent many of our subjects can now rest a bit easier, knowing that the sacrifices they have made have been well received.
translation: 经过对天象和历法的细致研究，我们的祭司们认定一个好的时代即将来临。既然世界末日不会很快来临，许多事务可以稍微缓一缓。众神应该已经很好的收到了我们的献祭。

original: Great!
Commoner Flaunting his Wealth

One of the expert artisan Tolteccas often employed by $MONARCH$ and other affluents in our society has attempted to rise above his social status. As a commoner he is expected to only hold a modest celebration when a child is born yet after the birth of his son last month he held a banquet worthy of at least a minor noble. While it is not wrong for a commoner to acquire wealth, flaunting it in this way is a great insult to our gods and traditions.
translation: 一位托尔特克技工，他常常被$MONARCH$和其他富人雇佣，现在尝试着想要僭越他的社会地位。作为一个平民当一个孩子出生时，他必须只能办一个小规模的庆祝。但他的儿子出生时，他办理了一个宴会，规格相当于一个小贵族。当然平民想要获取财富这并不是错，但以这种方式来炫耀就是对我们的神和传统的严重挑衅。

original: This is an affront to the gods. The Artisan must die.
translation: 这是对神灵的蔑视，这个技工必须死.

original: His work is too important for him to die.
translation: 他的工作太重要了，还是别让他死才好.

original: Incident during Nemontemi

A noble of one of our most prominent families was found drunk in the street today. Not only is this a terrible affront to the gods, punishable by strangulation, but it happened during the time of Nemontemi when all disturbances of the peace are strictly forbidden.
translation: 我国最显赫家族中的一位贵族今天被发现在街上喝的烂醉。这不仅仅是对神灵的蔑视，他会被勒死，而且这件事发生在无用日期间，这个时候原本任何对平静的扰乱都是不能允许的。

original: He must die.
Our need of this man is too great.
Wandering Sorcerer

We have received word from one of our provinces that a man claiming to have magical powers is spreading fear and evil rumors there. The local leaders are confident that this is a mere charlatan that they can handle but many commoners are susceptible to his influence.
translation: 我们从一个省份那里得到消息，有一个人宣称自己拥有魔力，这件事正在引起恐惧的流言。当地的官员确信这仅仅是是个吹牛皮的家伙，他们可以处理，但是很多愚民很容易被他所影响。

original: Send an emissary to catch him.
The hunt for the sorcerer begins.
Let local authorities deal with him.
Sorcerer Disappears
The problem with the sorcerer spreading fear in our lands seems to have gone away. He was never caught, but as the man has not been seen for many weeks now his bad influence has waned.
translation: 巫师散布的恐惧似乎已经消散了。他没被抓住，不过那个男人已经消失几个星期了，他所引发的影响也逐渐衰落了。

original: Ok.
Sorcerer Caught

The sorcerer spreading fear in our lands has been caught. The traditional punishment for a man like him would be to cut his hair, robbing him of his magical powers. As this man has managed to cause much more harm than the average countryside conjurer, however, perhaps it would be better to punish him by death immediately to placate gods and men alike.
translation: 在我们土地上散步恐惧的巫师已经被抓到了。对这种人的传统惩罚是割去他的头发，这样可以夺去他的魔力。既然这个人造成了远超过一般的乡间巫师所能造成的伤害，也许直接杀了他更能取悦众神和人民。

original: Cut his hair!
Kill him!
Tlacatecolotl

News has reached us that the punishment of the sorcerer who caused so much unrest in our lands did not go exactly as planned. None of this involved remain to tell the tale but the rumor that has been spreading is that the man was a true Tlacatecolotl and that an owl was seen leaving his cell. Regardless of if he did turn into an owl or not, the whole incident has caused wild rumors to spread all around our country.
translation: 我们得到消息说对那个巫师的惩罚引发了我们没有预料到的反抗。目前还没有具体的消息，不过已经有留言声称那个人是个真正的恶魔，有人看到一只猫头鹰飞离了他的牢房。不管他到底有没有变成一只猫头鹰，这整起事件已经让我们的国家流言四起。

original: The end is nigh.
Countryside Sorcerer Returns
It seems the sorcerer that got away from us once has now returned. Local authorities insist the man has been spreading diseases and making ill-boding predictions and must be stopped.
translation: 那个曾经逃过一次的巫师现在好想回来了。当地的政府部门声称那个人正在传播疾病，还在做出不吉利的语言，他必须被拿下。

original: Send an emissary to catch him.
Let local authorities deal with him.
Cihuateteo

A great disaster has befallen us. This morning $HEIR$ was missing. One of the child's servants insists that the perpetrator was a Cihuateotl bearing resemblance to a woman that died giving birth nearby recently. That such a dark creature would be able to spirit away our heir in the middle of the night is surely a sign that the end of the world draws nearer.
translation: 一场重大的灾难已经降临。今天早上$HEIR$失踪了。孩子的一个仆人坚持声称劫持他的人是跟最近因为难产去世的一位妇女很相像的一位产妇的亡灵：西瓦泰泰奥。这个黑暗的生物能把我们的继承人在深夜中神隐，这显然是这个世界正在接近世界末日的一个显著迹象。

original: We must do what we can to placate Tezcatlipoca and Tlazolteotl.
translation: 我们必须尽所有可能来取悦“烟雾镜”特斯卡特利波卡和“吞吃污秽者”特拉索莉捷奥特莉

original: Have the servant punished for spreading lies.
translation: 惩罚那个仆人，他在说谎。

original: Sickness of Ruler
$MONARCH$ has taken ill and has a rising fever. The doctors in attendance have recommended a number of infusions from roots and maize kernels.
translation: $MONARCH$病倒了，体温不断上升。出席的医生推荐了一些植物根茎和玉米粒的混合物作为药物。

original: Comply and hope for the best.
translation: 听医生的，希望能好起来。

original: We must conduct great sacrifices to placate the gods.
translation: 我们必须进行一场大规模的献祭来取悦众神。

original: Ollamalitzli

During the time in his house of youth [Root.Heir.GetName] became quite adept at the traditional Ollamalitzli ball game, but as an adult he has had to give up on this habit. As the game is played throughout the different districts of [Root.Capital.GetName], however, [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] is often seen as a spectator at the various courts near temples or markets even as an adult. This habit must also extend to participation in the wild betting that is often associated with the game as [Root.Heir.GetName] has come to you today asking for help to pay [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] debts.
translation: 在他少年学校的求学时期，[Root.Heir.GetName]成为一个出色的Ollamalitzli球员，但是成年之后他不得不放弃这项爱好。当比赛在[Root.Capital.GetName]的不同区域进行时，[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]常常出现在寺庙或者市场旁边的不同场馆的观众席上。这种习惯往往还会发展成为疯狂的赌球，今天[Root.Heir.GetName]跑来向你要钱来还赌债。

original: Help [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] out
Forbid [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] from participating again.
Prisoner Stolen

Battles between warriors are always individual affairs and it can be hard to keep track of exactly when or how each and every prisoner is taken. Recently some warriors observed one of our most experienced fighters sneaking away with a captive of another warrior. If the prisoner was stolen then it is one of the gravest offenses possible for a warrior, punishable only by death. Even worse, many suspect that the captor deliberately reassigned his prisoner to his comrade.
translation: 战士之间的战斗经常是个人行为，很难追踪每个战俘属于谁。最近一些战士发现了我们中间最有经验的一位勇士偷取了他人的一个战俘。偷盗战俘可能是对一个战士最大的冒犯，只能通过死刑来惩罚。更糟糕的是，很多人怀疑是那个人有意把战俘献给了他的长官。

original: Kill the accused.
Kill them both.
Spare the warriors.
Tlacaxipehualiztli - The Feast of the Flaying of Men

As the spring equinox and the planting season draws near the time of the Tlacaxipehualiztli is upon us. The time has come to sacrifice all prisoners of war at the temple of Xipe-Totec. Their blood will feed the gods and their skins will be worn by their captors and the priests of the temple before being saved in the holy cave.\nFate has rewarded us with many prisoners and this time the festival is going to last for many days. Much blood will be spilled in honor of the gods.
translation: 春分到了，播种的季节即将来临，剥皮节也即将来到。在那时，所有的战俘都将在西佩托堤克神庙被献祭。他们的血将奉献给众神，他们的人皮会被抓捕他们的战士以及神庙的祭司披上，然后保存在神圣的洞穴中。\n天命奖赏给我们许多战俘，今年的剥皮节将持续很多天。这么多的鲜血将被用来荣耀我们的众神。

original: Sacrifice the Prisoners
Hold an even grander festival, demanding additional prisoners from our subjects.
translation: 规模再弄大一点，要求我们的附庸也献上祭品。

original: The Gladiatorial Stone

As part of the grander Tlacaxipehualiztli festival this year the foremost among the captured warriors will be pitted against four of our best eagle and jaguar warriors while tied to a sacrificial stone and armed only with a mock Macuahuitl, a club with feathers instead of obsidian blades. In the unlikely event that the captive should survive the encounter with his first four adversaries he will face one final, left-handed, fighter. Apart from pleasing the gods this ceremony is immensely popular and is likely to attract a great number of spectators.
translation: 作为盛大的剥皮节中的一部分，今年，最重要的那些战俘将面对我们最优秀的美洲豹战士和雕战士，他们会被绑在献祭石的旁边，只被允许持有一把仿制的双刃刀，它们是用羽毛做的，没有黑曜石的刀刃。战俘能在遭遇前四个对手之后能活下来几乎已经是不可能了，即便是这样，他还要面对一个最终的对手，一个左撇子战士。这个仪式不仅能够取悦诸神，也收到许多观众的欢迎。

original: Let the fight begin.
Let's keep to a more modest celebration.
translation: 庆祝活动还是更节制一些比较好。

original: Uncooperative Warrior

Despite rigorous preparations the captive warrior that was supposed to fight at the gladiatorial stone today has proven less than cooperative. While the temple compound was filled to its brims with spectators the man refused to do battle and had to be struck down quickly by his first opponent. This has cast a long shadow over the entire celebration this year and some view it as a bad omen.
translation: 尽管做了充足的准备，那些被要求在角斗石前角斗的战俘今天非常的不配合。神庙群到处都是想要目睹庆祝的人群，但这个人拒绝参加角斗，他被他的第一个对手快速击倒。这件事给整个庆祝活动投下了阴影，有些人认为这是个坏的预兆。

original: Thus giveth the sun to drink.
A Great Spectacle.

The battle between our four champions and the captive warrior has exceeded all expectations. Not only did the captive survive the first four encounters, it almost looked as if he might have had a chance to beat the final, left-handed, opponent he then faced.\nAs is customary after the captive warrior was finally defeated his heart was sacrificed to the gods while his flesh was given to the captor's family to consume and his skin will be worn by the captor himself for many days.\nThe celebrations of this year's Tlacaxipehualiztli are likely to be remembered for years to come.
translation: 我们最出色的勇士和战俘的搏斗非常精彩，超出了所有观众的预期。战俘们不仅在前四次遭遇战中存活下来，甚至差一点就赢得了最终对抗左撇子对手的战斗.\n和往常一样，战俘最终被击败，他的心脏被献祭给众神，他的肉体被给予抓住他的战士的家族，被剥下的皮肤会被战士本人披着好多天.\n今年的剥皮庆祝活动在很多年之后都会被记住。

original: Thus giveth the sun to drink.
End of the celebrations
The Feast of the Flaying of men is now over and with it a new planting season begins. The extravagant celebrations this year will likely be remembered for a long time to come.
translation: 剥皮节日的祭典现在结束了，新的播种季节也到了，这次放纵的庆祝活动会很长时间都被人们所记得。

original: Thus giveth the sun to drink.
Tlacaxipehualiztli - The Feast of the Flaying of Men

As the spring equinox and the planting season draws near the time of the Tlacaxipehualiztli is upon us. The time has come to sacrifice all prisoners of war at the temple of Xipe-Totec. Their blood will feed the sun and their skins will be worn by their captors and the priests of the temple before being saved in the holy cave.\nAs we have not fought any wars recently, however, we have an acute shortage of prisoners to sacrifice. This is in itself a bad omen and things will likely only get worse if we are unable to spill more blood today.
translation: 春分到了，播种的季节即将来临，剥皮节也即将来到。在那时，所有的战俘都将在西佩托堤克神庙被献祭。他们的血将奉献给众神，他们的人皮会被抓捕他们的战士以及神庙的祭司披上，然后保存在神圣的洞穴中。\n然而我们最近没有进行很多战争，我们将缺少可以献祭的战俘。这本身就是个不好的预兆，如果我们不能有足够的鲜血来献祭事情只会变得更糟糕。

original: We must make do with the prisoners we have.
translation: 我们只能用已有的战俘来献祭。

original: Let our subject states provide prisoners.
translation: 让我们的附庸国提供祭品。

original: Pochteca Spies

The rich Pochteca trade guilds are essential to the trade network of Mesoamerica and their members are generally free to cross our borders as they please. This unreserved welcoming has, however, evidently been exploited by our rivals as a number of Pochteca traders now stand accused of espionage on their behalf.
translation: 富有的波切特卡商人公会对于中美洲的贸易网络至关重要，公会的成员可以随着自己的喜欢随意穿越边界。这种无限制的特权显然开始被我们的对手所利用，现在这些商人被指控帮助敌人进行间谍活动。

original: Confiscate their goods.
Imprison the Pochtecas.
We don't dare to do anything.
Pochteca Traders Harassed
translation: 波切特卡商人感到厌烦

original: The Pochteca Trade Guilds based in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] have come to us asking that we punish [From.GetName] for harassing their members. Apparently the Tlatoani of [From.GetName] claims that the Pochtecas have been spying on our behalf and has used this as an excuse to confiscate their goods.
translation: 位于[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的波切特卡商人找到我们抱怨惩罚[From.GetName]的行为滋扰了他们的成员。显然[From.GetName]的特拉托阿尼声称商人公会为我们做间谍这件事只不过是他想要私吞财物的借口。

original: I am shocked!
Great [Root.Culture.GetName] Poet

The spoken word has always had a special significance to our people, songs and recitations feature prominently in all our religious and profane ceremonies and even our highest leaders are referred to as Tlatoanis, speakers. Oral poetry is therefore one of the most sacred forms of art and one of few accepted ways in which a person can express dissatisfaction, anxiety and even doubt about fate itself without angering the gods.\nRecently an immensely popular Nahuatl poet has arrived in [Root.Capital.GetName], praising our city and its people but criticizing the Tlatoani himself.
translation: 语言对我们的人民有着特殊的意义，歌曲和朗诵的章节在我们所有的宗教和仪式中都有着显著的地位，甚至我们地位最高的领导都被称为Tlatoanis，说话者。口述的诗歌因此成为了最神圣的艺术之一，也是各人可以合法表达不满，愤怒甚至对命运质疑，而不会激怒众神的仅有的几种方式之一.\n最近一位非常受欢迎的纳瓦特诗人来到了[Root.Capital.GetName]，他赞颂了我们的城市和人民，但是批判了国王本人。

original: He pleases the gods and the people.
He cannot be allowed to stay.
Expansion of the [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] Main Temple

The main temple of our capital is the primary symbol of our rule and the bond we have with the gods. It is where all of the main sacrifices will be made during the many festivals of the year and it is the main target for any invading enemy. For a Tlatoani it is a duty to maintain and expand the temple whenever possible.
translation: 我们首都的主庙是我们统治和与众神紧密联系的最重要的象征，这里是主要的节日祭品奉献的地方，也是敌人入侵的主要目标。对一个过往来说，无论何时维持和扩张主庙都是他的义务。

original: Undertake an ambitious expansion of the Pyramid.
translation: 承担扩张金字塔的野心

original: Time to add another layer to the Pyramid.
translation: 现在是时候给金字塔再增加一层了。

original: Modest improvements, it's all we can afford.
translation: 我们只能承受适度的扩张。

original: We cannot afford to do much at this time.
translation: 现在我们没法进行扩建

original: Pilgrimage to Cholula

It is traditional for all our nobles to travel to the great shrine of Quetzalcoatl in the temple city of Cholula. Here the benevolent feathered serpent, protector of the arts and rains, can be worshipped and here the nobles of mesoamerica can show of their wealth without having to face each other in combat.
translation: 作为一项古老传统，我们所有的贵族都需要旅行至祭拜伟大的羽蛇神的神帝，乔卢拉的神庙城市。仁慈的羽蛇神，艺术和降雨的保护者，在这里中美洲的贵族们可以炫耀他们的财富，而不用面对互相之间的冲突。

original: Pay homage to Quetzalcoatl.
What kind of god does not require human sacrifice?
translation: 什么样的神不需要活人祭祀？

original: Earthquake

Each and every citizen of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] awoke at once this morning as a powerful earthquake shook the entire city, destroying several buildings and even some of the temples. To the great relief of commoner and noble alike, however, the city and most of its inhabitants remain unharmed.\nThe fact that the destruction of the 5th sun and the end of this age will come in the form of massive earthquakes that will destroy all living things is known to even the smallest child. We must thank the gods that have helped us keep this world alive for sparing us today.
translation: [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的每个居民在这个早上地震袭击时被同时惊醒。地震摧毁了几座建筑，甚至一些庙宇。让平民和贵族感到宽慰的是城市和大部分居民没有受到伤害。\n第五太阳纪的毁灭将来自与一场大地震，它将会摧毁所有已知的活物，甚至小孩。我们要感谢众神让我们在今天存活了下来。

original: Praise Tezcatlipoca, god of providence and ruler of the night.
translation: 感恩特斯卡特利波卡，至上的神灵力、人类命运的操弄者

original: Praise Quetzalcoatl, god of wisdom and life.
translation: 感恩魁札尔科亚特尔，智慧和人生之神.

original: Praise Huitzilopochtli, patron of war and god of the sun.
translation: 感恩乌伊斯托希瓦托，战争的庇佑者和太阳的神灵

original: Praise Xipe-Totec, god of war, death and agriculture.
translation: 感恩西佩托堤克，战争，死亡和农业之神.

original: Poison Rock
So called because of the deadly plants surrounding the rock.
translation: 它被这样叫是因为有毒的植物环绕着它

original: Poison Rock
So called because of the deadly plants surrounding the rock.
translation: 它被这样叫是因为有毒的植物环绕着它

original: Loyal Chief
We have personally appointed the chiefs in this region from our closest servants. For the time being at least this means the province is under tight central control.
translation: 我们从最心腹的仆人中选出一位担任这一地区的长官。至少到现在为止这个省份很好的在中央控制之下。

original: Oracle of Pachacamac
The Oracle of Pachacamac is one of the most important shrines in the Andean world and since the 7th century Andean rulers and nobles have come to ask the small wooden idol about their future.
translation: 帕查卡马克的神谕是安第斯世界最重要的圣地，自从七世纪开始安第斯人的统治者和贵族们就开始向这些小小的木头偶像询问他们的未来命运。

original: Major Huaca Temple
This province has seen an increased influx of pilgrims and a strengthened local identity after the elevation of a Huaca god by a local chief.
translation: 这个省份最近来了许多朝圣者，当地人的自我认同也增强了，这都是因为一个当地的官员拔高了一位瓦卡神的地位。

original: Uncooperative Families

The current social make up of this province has led to the number of marriages sharply declining here. The local priests are worried this will lead to declining population numbers but the families themselves are thankful to have been left alone to solve their own matchmaking problems.
translation: 这个省份目前的社会构成导致了婚姻数量的急剧减少。当地的祭司担心这将导致人口的减少，但是当地的家族只愿意自己解决婚配问题。

original: Arranged Marriages

A specifically appointed priest from the capital has been given the mission to act as a matchmaker here, making sure that petty social or economic squabbles do not hinder the population from pleasing Inti by entering into marriage.
translation: 首都特别指派的祭司被派来这里担任媒人的角色，确保当地社会经济的琐碎纷乱不会阻碍人口的增长，而婚姻是取悦因蒂的方式

original: Shrine of Viracocha
This is the site of the main temple of Viracocha, the creator of the world.
translation: 这里是创世者维拉科查的主庙

original: Fresh Members of the Royal Guard

We have brought in new, battle hardened, members of the hereditary royal guard from the provinces. While this has dramatically increased the quality of the guard itself both the older families in the guard and the people of the provinces that did not get to supply the new members are alarmed at this development.
translation: 我们从各省带进了一批新的接受过战斗磨砺的世代相传的皇家卫队成员。虽然这很大程度上提高了卫队的质量，但是这对卫队成员中的旧家族势力和没有提供新成员的省份是个警示。

original: Alienated Nobility
By expanding the royal guard we have brought new blood into the ranks of our nobility, something the old families are determined to stop.
translation: 通过扩充皇家卫队成员，我们给贵族阶序带来了新血，而这是旧贵族所不愿意看到的。

original: Attended Inti Raymi Festival
Refused to Attend Inti Raymi
$RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$'s Panaca

With the funeral of $RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$ his transition through mummification begins. Once the funeral rites have been observed the relatives and servants of $RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$ will form a Panaca lineage lead by the deceased ruler and tasked with preserving his memory and handling his affairs. His property and authority will remain what it was during his life and the mummy will continue to be the head of his lineage from now on.\nPanacas of former rulers often remain the most influential groups in high society and it is rare for a new ruler to rise without their support. Not all rulers are fit for mummification however, there are some we would rather forget.
translation: 在$RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$的葬礼上，他木乃伊化的进程开始了。当葬礼仪式结束后，$RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$的亲属和仆人们会建立一个由去世的君主领导的帕纳卡宗族，以保存他的记忆和处理他的事务。他的财产和权威将会和他生前一样，他会继续作为他宗族的头领。\n前一代的帕纳卡通常会是上流社会中最具影响力的团体，很少有新的统治者能不得到他们的支持而上台。当然不是每个统治者都适合被制成木乃伊，人们会更愿意忘记有些统治者。

original: $RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$'s Panaca is born.
The Mummy takes its place as the head of a new Panaca, taking its property with it.
translation: 木乃伊带着他所有的财产成为了新帕纳卡的头领。

original: This is no longer a ruler, it is a powerful Huaca, a god.
translation: 这不是一个统治者，而是一位胡阿卡，一位神明。

original: The Mummy will become a minor god to be worshipped by all instead.
translation: 木乃伊会成为一位次要的神明接受所有人的膜拜。

original: $RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$, who?
None but his own relatives shall be allowed to remember him. His property will be seized and in a few generations few will remember he ever existed.
translation: 只有他的亲属被允许铭记他。他的财产将被剥夺，在几代之后，很少有人会记住他。

original: A Suitable Wife for [Root.Heir.GetName]

The priests of Inti have made it clear that [Root.Heir.GetName] must take his sister as his primary wife to please the gods. Many of his ancestors and even the god of the sun himself have married this way within the family and kept the bloodline pure. The boy's mother, however, refuses to hear of this and will not give her consent.\nThe proper way to solve this schism would be to ask our ancestor, the mummy that is the head of our Panaca lineage for guidance.
translation: 因蒂的祭司指出[Root.Heir.GetName]必须将他的妹妹作为王后来取悦众神。先祖中的许多人，甚至太阳神自己也都通过这种家庭内的婚姻来维持血统的纯正。然而，男孩的母亲拒绝接受这个建议。\n解决这个分歧的方法是咨询我们的祖先，我们领导帕纳卡宗族的木乃伊。

original: Consult our ancestor.
Give in to his Mother.
Disregard the Mother outright.
Mallqui Approval

Through the priests of the Panaca, the Mummy at the head of our lineage has made it known that he approves of the proposed marriage. As his authority is supreme there is really no way now for anyone to object to the proposed marriage of [Root.Heir.GetName] to his sister.
translation: 通过帕纳卡的祭司，我们宗族的首领木乃伊让我们得知他同意这桩婚事。由于他的权威，没有人能反对[Root.Heir.GetName]向他妹妹提亲。

original: Then married they shall be.
On second thought, perhaps holding off is for the best.
translation: 经过再三考虑，也许暂时推迟才是更好的选择。

original: Mallqui Disapproval

Through the priests of the Panaca, the Mummy at the head of our lineage has made it known that he does not approve of the proposed marriage. As his authority is supreme there is really no way now to carry through with the marriage.
translation: 通过帕纳卡的祭司，我们宗族的首领木乃伊让我们得知他不同意这桩婚事。由于他的权威，没有人能在推动这桩婚事。

original: Ok.
Chief conspiring against [Root.Monarch.GetName]

Our religious inspector has uncovered a conspiracy where one of the minor chiefs of the realm has been conspiring against the health of [Root.Monarch.GetName] through a golden Huaca god.\nWhile it is doubtful if there was ever any real risk for [Root.Monarch.GetName] the inspector is proposing that we make an example of this chief, and proclaim him the worst kind of traitor as well as forcibly removing the Huaca that was involved.
translation: 我们的宗教调查人员发现了一桩阴谋，一个小酋长在通过一个黄金胡阿卡神像密谋伤害[Root.Monarch.GetName]的健康。\n虽然这是否对[Root.Monarch.GetName]真有危害还有所争议，调查人员建议我们杀鸡儆猴，把这个酋长称为最坏的叛徒并把涉及到的胡阿卡也移除。

original: Removing the Huaca is enough.
translation: 移除那个胡阿卡神就够了。

original: This chief will face the Sankacancha pit.
translation: 这个酋长将面临桑卡堪察坑。

original: The chief is executed and a loyal servant is appointed to rule the area until the situation stabilizes.
translation: 酋长被处决了，一位忠实的仆人被指派管理这个地区直到情况稳定。

original: Reprimand the Chief but let him live.
translation: 剥夺酋长头衔但是让他活下去。

original: Veneration of Local Huaca

A ruler is expected to travel around his kingdom, inspecting each and every part of his realm and partaking in the religious as well as worldly ceremonies of his chiefs. As [Root.Monarch.GetName] approaches the huge temple of a local Huaca god, a mummy of dynasty long gone, the royal priests urge caution. This is an unusually popular Huaca and if we are seen to honor the Huacas of our subjects too clearly we would be giving them too much power and authority.\nOn the other hand this Huaca is said to be very powerful and its popularity along with the favors it might provide are very enticing.
translation: 一位统治者需要在他的王国巡游，调查王国的每一部分，参与宗教活动并口头上为他的酋长们加封。当[Root.Monarch.GetName]接近一个当地胡阿卡，一个很久以前王朝的木乃伊的巨大的庙宇时，皇家祭司提醒他小心。这是一个非比寻常热门的胡阿卡。如果我们被过于清晰地看到向他致敬，我们可能会给与他们太大的势力和权威。\n另一方面，这个胡阿卡被认为非常强大，他的热门程度和信徒的狂热是非常诱人的。

original: Honor the Huaca.
Avoid visiting the Temple.
Force the chief to send the Huaca to [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 强制酋长把胡阿卡送到[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]。

original: The Young Men and Women of [Root.GetName]

The priests of [Root.GetName] are concerned about too many of the young men and women in the area remaining unmarried. It seems events have conspired to make it hard to make good social and economic matches here and the families in the area are reluctant agree to any proposed match. It is not unheard of for a [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] to step in and forcibly arrange marriages in times such as these. Perhaps it is time for [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName] to step in?
translation: [Root.GetName]的牧师对于那里过多尚未婚配的年轻男女而感到担忧。似乎一些巧合让这里的婚姻对象在社会和经济地位上很难匹配，而且这个地区的家庭对于任何形式的求婚一事并不情愿。[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]在这种情况下介入并强制安排婚姻这样的事情并不是前所未闻的。也许是[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName]插手的时候了？

original: Send a priest to arrange suitable matches.
translation: 派遣一个祭司去安排合适的婚姻。

original: It is not for us to meddle in these things.
translation: 我们不能干涉这些事情。

original: Shrine of Viracocha

After having created the world and given each ethnic group their language and clothes, Viracocha traveled from lake Titicaca through the Andes disguised as an old man. As he wasn't recognized as a deity he was badly treated and in order to demonstrate his identity he eventually burned the earth and forced the people to recognize his power.\nToday the route from lake Titicaca is dotted with the shrines of the great god and Kacha, where he forced the people to recognize him, would be an ideal location for a temple to the great creator.
translation: 在创造了世界并给予每个民族自己的语言和服饰后，维拉科查伪装成一位老人开始从的的喀喀湖向整个安第斯游历。由于他并没有被认出是一位神衹他被很不好地对待。为了展示他的身份，他最终烧毁了大地并强迫人们见识他的力量。\n如今这条从的的喀喀湖开始的路径点缀着这位主神的祭坛。而卡查，他强迫人们认识到他力量的地方，是这位创世者神庙的绝佳地点。

original: We must build such a temple.
Let's focus our resources on other things.
translation: 让我们把资源投入别的事情。

original: Aucachic Confessors

After a recent war guilt lies like a heavy blanket over our people. It is time to give them the opportunity to purify themselves from the sins they have had to commit in times of war. Our priests have signaled that this would be an opportune time to hold a festival of purification and fasting so that anyone could confess to the Aucachics and be cleansed in the streams of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 在最近的战争后，负罪感如同一块厚重的毯子压迫着我们的人民。现在是时候给他们一个从他们战时犯下的罪行中净化自己的机会。我们的祭司示意这是一个举办净化和斋戒的节日的机会，任何人都可以向奥卡切克告解并在[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的溪流中净化自己。

original: Sounds like a good idea.
Let's not.
Great Temple of [Root.GetName]

Word has reached us that a local chief in [Root.GetName] has begun to construct an ambitious new temple for the main Huaca God of his tribe. As is often the case this Huaca also happens to be a mummified ancestor of his own lineage. While the chief seems content to acknowledge our authority it is hard to shake the notion that he is attempting to build a bigger power base for himself in [Root.GetName].\nThe priests of Inti in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] strongly advocate that we remove the Huaca to put this chief in his place.
translation: 据传[Root.GetName]的酋长开始雄心勃勃地为他们部落的主神建造一座新的神庙。和通常一样，这个神明也是他们自己宗族的一位木乃伊化的祖先。虽然这位酋长承认我们的权威，同时也不能不注意到他正试图在[Root.GetName]为他自己建立一个更大的权力基础。\n[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的因蒂祭司强烈建议我们驱逐这个酋长试图摆放的这个胡阿卡。

original: Order the chief to turn over his Huaca.
translation: 命令酋长抛弃他的胡阿卡。

original: Allow the temple to be built.
Reciprocity

Nothing comes for free in this world. While any of the many chiefs in our realm would immediately profess to be our loyal servant if asked we can be sure that loyalty comes with a price. Unless we regularly hold great feasts for the chiefs of our realm and see to it that they are rewarded with gifts for their many services to us, we might well find they lack the motivation to do even the simplest of tasks for us.
translation: 在这个世界上没有什么是免费的。虽然我们王国的诸多酋长中的任何一个被问及时会立刻承诺是我们重视的仆人，我们知道这种忠诚也是有代价的。除非我们定期为我们王国的酋长们举办盛大的宴会并用礼物回报他们对我们的服务，我们可能会发现他们缺乏为我们干哪怕最简单任务的动力。

original: Let us hold a lavish feast.
translation: 让我们举办一场奢华的宴会。

original: We cannot afford more than a moderate feast.
translation: 我们不能承受任何超过一般程度的宴会。

original: I can see no need for such extravagance.
translation: 我没有看到任何这种浪费的意义。

original: Festival of Water

Without rivers and streams life in the Andes would be much harder and the spirits that animate the running water are certainly worthy of our appreciation. The time has come for the festival of Purapucyo. The strong streams of the Andes are ready to receive our gifts.
translation: 如果没有河流和溪流，安第斯的生命会艰难许多，所以流水的精神当然值得我们崇敬。现在是时候举办普拉普克约狂欢节了。安第斯强大的溪流正等着接受我们的礼物。

original: A sacrifice of Chicha Beer to drink.
A sacrifice of Llamas to ease their burdens.
A sacrifice of fine Cloth to keep them warm.
Construction of a Temple

The people of the province of [Root.GetName] are divided and worship various local Huaca Gods. It has therefore been decided that a great temple of Inti should be constructed here as a natural centre for the spiritual and administrative life of the region.\nThe leader of the construction has presented [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName] with two different plans for the temple. The first plan is to construct the temple at a Tincuy, the sacred confluence of two streams, while the other plan calls for making use of an old Huaca shrine as the base of the new temple.
translation: [Root.GetName]省的人民产生了分裂并崇拜着各种当地的胡阿卡神。所以我们决定应当建立一个巨大的因蒂神庙来使这里成为该地区宗教和治理的自然中心。\n建设工程的领导者给[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName]带来了两份不同的建设计划。第一个计划是在两条溪流的交汇点特因库伊建造，另一个计划是将一个现存的旧胡阿卡祭坛作为新神庙的基础。

original: A new temple needs a new location, the Tincuy it is.
translation: 新的神庙需要新的地址，特因库伊。

original: Let's make use of the old shrine.
Oracles and Divination

The world can sometimes be an unforgiving place and fate may turn in surprising ways. Luckily we have the Huaca Gods of our people to help us interpret what the future holds. Should the future be too hard for the Huacas to penetrate there are other oracles in the Andes, but they require a worthy gift before sharing their visions. [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been beset by ample doubts recently and it is perhaps time to consult the auguries.
translation: 世界有时是一个残酷的地方而命运会以令人惊奇的方式转变。幸运的是，我们有胡阿卡神来帮助我们解读未来。如果未来太难以被胡阿卡神看穿的话，在安第斯还有别的神谕，不过他们需要高价的礼物才会分享他们的视野。[Root.Monarch.GetName]最近被各种疑问困扰，也许是时候去咨询这些预兆了。

original: Consult the oracle of our local Huaca at [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 咨询[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]当地胡阿卡的神谕

original: Travel to the great Oracle of Pachacamac.
translation: 去访问帕查卡马克的神谕。

original: We must go to the Oracle of Apurímac.
translation: 我们必须去访问阿普里马克的神谕。

original: Best not to dwell on the future.
Favorable answer from the Huatuc & Hamurpa
translation: 哈图克和哈姆帕给出好的解答。

original: A great number of diviners are attached to any given Oracle's shrine. The Guacarimachic speak to Huacas while the Ayatapuc communicate with the dead. The Huatuc achieves a prophetic mood using a holy beverage while the Hamurpa read the entrails of sacrificed Llamas or other animals.\nAll of these great diviners have now dwelt on the questions [Root.Monarch.GetName] has come to pose and all agree that the time ahead will be a most fruitful and successful one.
translation: 任何神谕的祭坛都有很大数量的预言者。瓜卡利玛查克和胡阿卡交流，而阿亚塔普克向死人交流。哈图克通过一种神圣的饮料来获取预言而哈姆帕通过被献祭的羊驼或其他动物的内脏来读取预言。\n所有这些预言者已经对[Root.Monarch.GetName]带来的问题进行了解读并一致同意将来会是成功而充满收获的。

original: Excellent.
Conflicted answer of the Huatuc & Hamurpa
translation: 哈图克和哈姆帕给出互相冲突的答案

original: A great number of diviners are attached to any given Oracle's shrine. The Guacarimachic speak to Huacas while the Ayatapuc communicate with the dead. The Huatuc achieves a prophetic mood using a holy beverage while the Hamurpa read the entrails of sacrificed Llamas or other animals.\nAll of these great diviners have now dwelt on the questions [Root.Monarch.GetName] has come to pose but the answer is not as favorable as he would have hoped. The signs are conflicted and as far as can be discerned the future holds both risks and opportunities for us.
translation: 任何神谕的祭坛都有很大数量的预言者。瓜卡利玛查克和胡阿卡交流，而阿亚塔普克向死人交流。哈图克通过一种神圣的饮料来获取预言而哈姆帕通过被献祭的羊驼或其他动物的内脏来读取预言。\n所有这些预言者已经对[Root.Monarch.GetName]带来的问题进行了解读，可是答案似乎并不是我们预想的那么好。这些预兆互相冲突，可以看出未来同时有着风险和机会。

original: Ok.
Mitmaq Wanting to Go Home

With the conquest of new lands we have come across groups of people that have been forcibly moved as Mitmaq from one region to another by their former overlords. As Mitmaq are not allowed to change the way they speak, the clothes they wear and have to take all their property with them, these people have never stopped to yearn for their original homes.\nAs it happens their area of origin is also under our control and a delegation from the Mitmaq has therefore been sent before [Root.Monarch.GetName] claiming that their Huacas have told them to return, begging us to lift their obligations.
translation: 在征服新的土地后，我们遇到了一些被他们过去的领主作为密特马克被强制迁徙的人民。由于密特马克不被允许改变他们呢说话的方式，穿着的衣服并且必须携带所有的财产，他们从未停止怀念他们的故乡。\n恰巧他们的故乡也在我们控制之下，所以密特马克的一个特使来到[Root.Monarch.GetName]面前声称他们的胡阿卡召唤他们回去，希望我们解除他们的义务。

original: Allow the Mitmaq to Return.
They are needed where they are.
translation: 他们需要留在他们所在的地方。

original: Priests Inciting Unrest in [Root.GetName]

The priests of a minor Huaca god in [Root.GetName] have been trying to inflame opinions against our rule by saying that we are slowly attempting to increase the authority of Inti and marginalize that of all the Huaca Gods. Luckily most of our subjects know better than to listen to these wild accusations but one of [Root.GetName]'s tribes supports the priests and have now demanded that we give them guarantees for the safety of their Gods and their people.
translation: [Root.GetName]的一个次要神明的祭司试图煽动对我们统治的不满。他们说我们在试图增强因蒂神的权威并边缘化所有的胡阿卡神。幸运的是我们的人民多数能够清醒地不听这些毫无根据的指责。但是[Root.GetName]的一个部落支持这些祭司并希望我们向他们保证他们神明和人民的安全。

original: The time has come for these people to move on, as Mitmaq.
translation: 是时候让这些人迁徙了，作为密特马克。

original: Give guarantees to the local priests.
translation: 向他们的祭司作出保证。

original: These priests are only fit for the Sankacancha pit.
translation: 这些祭司只适合桑卡堪察坑。

original: Growth of [Root.GetName]

The state policy to arrange marriages in [Root.GetName] has paid off.
