Not only has the worrying trend receded, the population has in fact sharply increased as a result of our meddling.\nWhile the increase of the workforce benefits the province in general, however, the feelings of resentment from the families forced to make suboptimal matches remain.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]安排婚姻的政策取得了成效。不仅是这个令人担忧的趋势停止了，人口也在我们的干涉下取得了巨大的增加。\n尽管劳动力的增长对省份的发展有益，因为强迫的进行并非最优的婚配而带来的不满依然有着影响。

original: Ok.
Inti Raymi, the Festival of the Sun

The Yañca priests, in charge of monitoring the sun, have proclaimed that the most opportune time to celebrate the Inti Raymi festival is almost upon us. The festival which lasts several days typically involves the entire population of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] as well as important chiefs from the countryside and some of their minor Huaca Gods.
translation: 负责观测太阳的雅安查祭司声称最适合庆祝雷密狂欢节的时间马上就要到了。这个持续多日的狂欢节通常会由[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的全体人民和一些重要酋长们以及他们的一些胡阿卡神参与。

original: The population of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] will participate.
Call upon all of the important Chiefs of the Empire.
translation: 叫来我们帝国的重要的酋长。

original: All chiefs and all Huaca gods must attend the ceremony.
translation: 所有的酋长和胡阿卡必须参与。

original: Insubordinate Chiefs
Some of the chiefs that have been called have taken offense to being ordered around and have refused to join the Inti Raymi festival.
translation: 一些酋长对被我们使唤非常不满并拒绝参与雷密狂欢节。

original: Bribe them with expensive goods and promises.
translation: 用贵重的物品和承诺贿赂他们。

original: We will have to make do.
If they do not come willingly we will force them.
translation: 如果他们不愿意来我们就强迫他们来。

original: Huacas Kept
Priests in charge of some of the Huaca Gods have taken offense to being ordered to move their deity to [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] and are refusing to come.
translation: 一些胡阿卡神的祭司对被命令把他们的神明移动到[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]非常不满并拒绝来参与雷密狂欢节。

original: We will make do without them.
Force them to comply.
Invitation to the festival of Inti Raymi
translation: 因蒂雷密狂欢节的请帖。

original: A messenger has arrived from [From.GetName] demanding our presence at the festival of Inti Raymi in [From.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 来自[From.GetName]的信使希望我们参与[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]的因蒂雷密狂欢节。

original: Then we must go to celebrate the sun!
translation: 那我们必须去为太阳而庆祝！

original: Let's stay home and honor the sun in our own way.
translation: 让我们留在家里用我们自己的方式向太阳致敬。

original: The ruler of [From.GetName] declines to join.
[From.Monarch.GetName], the ruler of [From.GetName] has declined our invitation to join in the celebration of Inti Raymi.
translation: [From.Monarch.GetName]，[From.GetName]的统治者，拒绝了我们请他们参与因蒂雷密的邀请。

original: We will make do without them.
Celebration of Inti Raymi

After several days of fasting and abstinence the time has come for the festival of the sun. As the population of [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] prepare for the grand ceremonies in which the sun is greeted and animals sacrificed they also know that several days of feasting are ahead of them.
translation: 在多日的斋戒之后，太阳狂欢节的日子到来了。[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]的人民在准备这场向太阳致敬和献祭动物的庆典时他们也知道一连数天的宴会在等着他们。

original: Ok.
Celebration of Inti Raymi

After several days of fasting and abstinence the time has come for the festival of the sun. The Squares of [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] are filled to their brim as the ceremonies to greet the sun begin and animals and other gifts are sacrificed by the people of our [Root.GovernmentName] and the many chiefs under our rule. Several days of feasting and gifts given by our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to his subjects now await.
translation: 在多日的斋戒之后，太阳狂欢节的日子到来了。在这个向太阳致敬和献祭动物的节日里，[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]的广场上充满了[Root.Country.GetTitle]的人民和各地的酋长。几天的宴会和我们[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]给他附庸的礼物正在等待。

original: Ok.
Celebration of Inti Raymi

After several days of fasting and abstinence the time has come for the festival of the sun. The Squares of [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] are filled to their brim as the ceremonies to greet the sun begin and animals and other gifts are sacrificed by the people of our [Root.GovernmentName], the many chiefs under our rule and the many Huaca idols from the lands we control. Several days of feasting and gifts given by our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to his subjects now await.
translation: 在多日的斋戒之后，太阳狂欢节的日子到来了。在这个向太阳致敬和献祭动物的节日里，[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]的广场上充满了[Root.Country.GetTitle]的人民和各地的酋长以及许多我们统治的土地的胡阿卡的神像。几天的宴会和我们[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]给他附庸的礼物正在等待。

original: Ok.
Celebration of Inti Raymi

After several days of fasting and abstinence the time has come for the festival of the sun. The Squares of [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] are filled to their brim as the ceremonies to greet the sun begin and animals and other gifts are sacrificed by the people of our [Root.GovernmentName], the many chiefs under our rule and the many Huaca idols from the lands we control. Several days of feasting and gifts given by our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to his subjects now await.
translation: 在多日的斋戒之后，太阳狂欢节的日子到来了。在这个向太阳致敬和献祭动物的节日里，[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]的广场上充满了[Root.Country.GetTitle]的人民和各地的酋长以及许多我们统治的土地的胡阿卡的神像。几天的宴会和我们[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]给他附庸的礼物正在等待。

original: Ok.
Itu Celebration

There is great distress in our lands. People are suffering and many fear for the future. In times like these an Itu celebration for the entire kingdom might lighten the minds of our subjects. The sacrifices it entails will also make the Gods more listen to our plights.\nFor this festival our priests are urging that we undertake a human sacrifice as the plight of our people have been great and they feel a grand ceremony is necessary to placate the gods.
translation: 我们土地正经历巨大的苦难。人民正在受苦，许多人正在担忧未来。在这种时候一场为了整个王国的伊图庆典可能会舒缓我们臣民的精神。庆典中的祭品也会让神们更易于倾听我们的困扰。\n为了这场庆典，我们的祭司指出我们必须献祭活人。这是由于我们人民的苦难非常巨大，他们觉得为了取悦诸神一场盛大的庆典是必须的。

original: Let us stick with the customary sacrifices.
translation: 让我们坚持传统的祭品。

original: Hold a customary festival with sacrifices of Llamas, Cloth, Sheep and Chicha.
translation: 进行一场传统的祭祀，使用羊驼，布匹，羊和契卡。

original: Human Sacrifice it is.
Hold a larger and longer festival culminating in the sacrifice of Human Children.
translation: 举办一场更大更长的狂欢，在高潮献祭人类儿童。

original: We must focus on the here and now.
translation: 我们必须集中注意力于当下。

original: Celebration of the Itu

After days of celebration the future certainly looks brighter. Grand ceremonial dancing ceremonies in the public squares of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName], feasts for all vassal chiefs and ample sacrifices of animals, cloth and Chicha beer to the gods will ensure that the Gods look more favorably on our realm in the future.
translation: 在多日的庆典后，未来当然看上去更光明了。[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]广场上盛大的舞蹈，招待所有附庸酋长的宴会和盛大的动物，布匹和契卡啤酒的祭品会确保诸神在未来更保佑我们的土地。

original: Ok.
Celebration of the Itu

After days of celebrations, public feasting, ceremonial dancing and both initiated and ended with the sacrifice of the most perfect children our lands could bring forth, we feel confident we will face a brighter future.
translation: 在多日的庆典，公开宴会，典礼舞蹈以及祭典开头和结尾时的献祭的我们土地上能找到的最完美的儿童，我们有自信我们会有一个更光明的未来。

original: Ok.
The Royal Guards

The honor to guard the life of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is hereditary and belongs to a number of families in [From.Capital.GetCapitalName]. This honor is in itself not a guarantee of martial prowess however. After a tour in the provinces it is clear to [Root.Monarch.GetName] that the quality of the guard could be dramatically improved if we brought in some new blood from the countryside.\nThis would, however, not be well received by the families currently given the privilege, at least not until the new members have been integrated for a few generations.
translation: 保护[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]生命的荣誉是世袭的，它属于一些[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]的家族。然而这个荣誉本身却并不是武力的保障。在游历了各地后，[Root.Monarch.GetName]很清楚如果从其他地区注入一些新鲜血液的话，侍卫的质量可以极大地增强。\n然而这对现在拥有这些特权的家族来说，并不是那么容易接受，起码在新成员在几代人的时间内被接受之前都是这样。

original: Bring in new blood.
Let them keep their privilege.
translation: 让我们保持他们的特权。

original: Alarmed Nobles

A delegation from some of the finest families in [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] has approached [Root.Monarch.GetName] demanding that the new members of the royal guard be sent back to their homes in the provinces. While they are pleased that the institution as such was not changed they are abhorred by the kind of people that now have the hereditary right to guard the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. These men are not fit to be part of the high aristocracy of [From.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 一个来自[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]的某一最强大家族的特使来到了[Root.Monarch.GetName]面前，要求皇家侍卫的新成员被送回老家。尽管他们对这个制度没有变化感到满意，他们对拥有护卫[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]世袭权利的新人感到厌恶。这些人不适合成为[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]的高等贵族。

original: Revert the decision to expand the Guard.
Give it a generation or two.
translation: 给他们一两代人的时间。

original: Attack in [From.Capital.GetCapitalName]

During the customary serving of beverages to the commoners from around the royal litter in the squares of [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] today [Root.Monarch.GetName] was attacked by a small group of would-be assassins. The group suddenly retreated without being anywhere near achieving the goal of hurting [Root.Monarch.GetName], but it was worryingly clear that the royal guards never saw this coming. Perhaps because they are not yet used to the bustling environment of [From.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 今天在[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]的广场上举行的一个向普通人分发饮料的传统仪式上[Root.Monarch.GetName]被一小撮可能的刺客袭击了。这组人在完全没有接近伤害[Root.Monarch.GetName]的目标的情况下突然撤退了，但是令人担忧的是皇家侍卫并没有预见到这次攻击。可能是他们还没习惯于[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]繁华的环境。

original: Revert the decision to expand the Guard.
This seems a bit too convenient...
Start an investigation into who planned the attack.
translation: 开始调查谁策划了袭击

original: Investigation Stalled

The investigation into the attack in [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] never had much to go on and it has been hard to get people to cooperate, especially among the nobility. While the investigator seems to suspect that this was the work of some discontent sons of the aristocracy we can never know for sure.
translation: 对[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]发生的袭击的调查没有取得太多进展，人们对调查很不配合，尤其是贵族。虽然有些调查者怀疑这是一些不满的贵族子弟的阴谋，但是我们不能确信。

original: Ok.
Plot Uncovered

The investigation into the attack in [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] has uncovered an amateurish plot by a group of young nobles from the families that felt marginalized in the royal guard. They claim that the attack was never intended to harm anyone, just point towards the weaknesses of the new additions to the guard. The punishment for treason is clearly death but the nobility of [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] would clearly not feel any less threatened if we killed their sons. If we forgive them the transgression perhaps that will be the end of this.
translation: 对[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]发生的袭击的调查揭露了一个业余的阴谋。它由一群感到被边缘化的皇家侍卫家族中的年轻贵族发起。他们声称这次攻击从没有打算伤害任何人，只是想攻击新加入的侍卫的弱点。对叛国的惩罚显然将是死刑，然而[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]的贵族显然会对杀死他们的儿子感到威胁。如果我们原谅他们的罪愆也许这将终结这一切。

original: To the Sankacancha Pit!
Forgive the Nobles.
Enable
Disable

translation: 你国家的花费受到如下因素影响：

translation: 国家理念超过§Y$LIMIT$%§!的外交等级: $VALUE$

Jan Mayen
Jan Mayen
The next treasure fleet from $COUNTRY$ will arrive in §Y$DATE$§!. We estimate it will bring us gold and silver worth §Y$NUM$§!.
translation: 下一支来自$COUNTRY$的宝船舰队会在§Y$DATE$§!抵达。我们预计他们会带来价值§Y$NUM$§!的黄金和白银。

original: $COUNTRY$ cannot send a Treasure Fleet because our Trade capital $OURNODE|Y$ is not downstream from their Trade capital $THEIRNODE|Y$.
translation: $COUNTRY$不能派遣珍宝船队，因为我们的贸易中心$OURNODE|Y$ 不是$THEIRNODE|Y$的下游。

original: §RThey will keep their gold income instead.§!\n\nIf we would move our Trade capital to a node downstream to theirs, we would receive Treasure Fleets.
translation: §R他们会保留黄金收入§!\n\n如果我们将贸易中心迁移到他们的下游节点，便可接受珍宝船队。

original: §R- Can only sacrifice adult monarchs and heirs.§!
translation: §R- 只能献祭成年的君主和继承人。§!

original: §R- They have no heir to sacrifice!§!
translation: §R- 他们没有继承人可以献祭！§!

original: §R- We have recently had a ruler or heir sacrificed, we cannot sacrifice another until §Y$DATE$§!.§!
translation: §R- 我们最近献祭了一个统治者或继承人，我们在§Y$DATE$§!前不能进行另一次献祭。§!

original: Sacrificing §Y$TITLE$ $RULER$§! of §Y$COUNTRY$§! to the Gods will lower our Doom by §G$AMT$§!, reduce relations by §R-100§! and increase the Liberty desire of all our vassals by §R$LD_INC$%§!.
translation: 将§Y$COUNTRY$§!的§Y$TITLE$$RULER$§!献祭给诸神可降低我们§G$AMT$§!点末日值、降低§R-100§!点关系，并提高所有附庸§R$LD_INC$%§!点独立倾向。

original: Sacrificing the heir of §Y$COUNTRY$§! to the Gods will lower our Doom by §G$AMT$§!, reduce relations by §R-75§! and increase the Liberty desire of all our vassals by §R$LD_INC$%§!.
translation: 将§Y$COUNTRY$§!的继承人献祭给诸神将降低我们§G$AMT$§!点末日，降低§R-75§!关系，并增加所有臣属§R$LD_INC$%§!独立倾向。

original: Reunite the League of Mayapan
Once all Maya states of importance fought under the same banner. Let us recreate the League of Mayapan and put the petty conflicts that once shattered the confederation behind us.
translation: 当所有重要的玛雅国家在同一个旗帜下战斗时，让我们重建玛雅潘联盟并把一度分裂我们联盟的冲突抛到身后。

original: §YYou have already selected this modifier, selecting will swap slots with the previously selected.§!
translation: §Y你已经选择了这个修正，再次选择将会和上一次选择交换槽位。§!

original: §YRandom or Custom Setup has been selected in Options. Please create a Custom Nation to start the game.§!
translation: §Y选项中设定了随机或自定义设置。轻创建一个自定义国家来开始游戏。§!

original: This will change your Authority by at most $CHANGE$.
translation: 这将改变你最多$CHANGE$的权威。

original: One Nation, One People

Loyalty to your nation is an honorable trait, but a land may consist of many different nations. With the notion that our people is part of one nation only, we will fight against the divide that many small nations cause.
translation: 对国家的忠诚是一个值得尊敬的品质，但是一块土地可能由许多国家组成。在我们的人民都是来自于同一个国家的口号下，我们会对抗由许多小国家导致的分裂。

original: Imperial Rule

The ruler of an Empire, a Holy Roman one, must be ready to exert authority over those they wish to rule and ensure that this is accepted by all. This authority must be practiced, exerted and maintained so that no one will question your right to rule over a Holy Roman Empire.
translation: 神圣罗马帝国的统治者，必须灵活地对他们对想要控制地区施加权威，并保证为所有人所接受。运用、施加、维护这些权威，以确保无人质疑你对帝国的统治。

original: The Education of Daughters

Both ancient and contemporary thinkers have argued for the intellectual capacity of women and the necessity of ensuring a good education for young girls. Having seen this to be true, we conclude that precluding women from taking part in matters of governance would be a foolish restriction.
translation: 古今的思想家都认为良好的教育对年轻女孩十分必要且女性也可以很知书达礼。因之，我们认为将妇女排除在管理层之外是十分愚蠢的限制.

original: Warrior Women

Many nations have seen women take up arms in revolts and times of need, but few have our distinct tradition of women leading the people into war. This is reflected in our recruitment of male and female generals alike in our search for the best and bravest.
translation: 许多国家的女性会在反抗和必需时拿起武器，但像我们这样，由女性在战争中领导人民的独特传统是很少的.这说明我们的男性和女性将领都是最好的和最勇敢的.

original: Error loading Nation
Failed to load Custom Nation settings. The file is corrupted.
translation: 读取自定义国家设置失败。文件已损坏。

original: Error writing Nation
Failed to save Custom Nation for unknown reason.\n\nDo you have enough free space?
translation: 保存自定义国家失败，原因未知。\n\n可能是没有足够空间

original: The Trail Grows Cold
The legendary treasure we once set out to find seems to be out of our reach. Having heard or seen nothing for this long our Conquistadors are beginning to despair.
translation: 我们一直在寻找的传说中的宝藏似乎已经很难找到了. 我们的征服者因为一直没有任何发现已经开始绝望了.

original: We will have to seek other treasures instead.
translation: 我们只能试着去寻找其他的宝藏了.

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] spills some of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] blood, this will surely aid our warrior but if the warrior is defeated our ruler's reputation will be affected.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]献祭了[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]自己的一部分血，这肯定能帮助我们的战士。但是如果他们被击败了，我们的统治者名声肯定会受到影响。

original: Expanded Bureaucracy
The bureaucracy is expanding to meet the needs of the expanding bureaucracy.
translation: 官僚系统不断扩大自己，只为了满足其扩大自己的需求。

original: New State Departments
New positions and departments of the government must be created so that ministers are able to focus on their respective areas of expertise.
translation: 政府必须安排新的部门和职位，以此来让我们的顾问们在他们擅长的领域发挥职能。

original: Promote Provincial Statesmen
Promising statesmen operating outside the capital should be given opportunities to advance in the central government.
translation: 我们应当给首都之外地区的优秀政客以机会，以便他们进入中央政府。

original: Permanent Embassies
Establishing permanent consulates in foreign nations will enhance our diplomatic reach and inform policy-making.
translation: 在外国设置永久使节可以改善我们的外交食物和政策的制定。

original: Council of Generals
We should schedule regular meetings between our generals so that they can share tactical knowledge and provide an overview of the strategic situation.
translation: 我们应当组织将军们定期会晤以便他们分享各自的战术知识并对当前的战略情况进行评估。

original: Invite Foreign Strategists
We should look beyond our borders for the best military minds of the day.
translation: 为了获取当今最英明的军事人才，我们需要把眼光扩展向国外。

original: The Cannibal Conquistador of [long_pig_country.GetName]

[long_pig_country.GetName]'s conquistador has admitted that their expedition members ate human flesh! They tried to defend themselves by claiming that they had no idea what kind of meat they were offered by their host tribe, and that the name they were given had translated to 'long pig'.
translation: [long_pig_country.GetName]的征服者承认他们的远征队员吃了人肉！但他们竭力为自己辩护，称他们不知道当地土著提供给他们叫「长猪」的肉到底是什么肉。
